Exile |exile.lurker.net|4000|http://exile.lurker.net

theme:|End|of|The|World,|Fallout,|Mad|Max,|Judge|Dredd|<br/>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Humankind|has|come|close|to|its|end|many|times|throughout|history.
Ever|since|the|invention|of|Nuclear|weapons|that|became|possible.
Somehow|we've|been|able|to|avoid|that|conflict.

In|the|near|future..|we|don't.|

It|is|not|known|exactly|how|many|thousand|warheads|detonated
throughout|the|world.|Humankind|and|much|of|the|earth|descended|into
a|dark|age|like|no|other.|

Only|about|10|percent|of|the|population|has|survived,|however
another|species|has|arisen:|Mutants.|Such|as|the|name|suggests|they
were|once|indeed|humans,|however|as|generations|began|to|pass..|It
began|doubtful|that|the|two|could|co-exist|peacefully.

In|the|middle|of|this|survival|between|two|species,|a|city|located
where|Phoenix|used|to|be,|(Now|called|New|Phoenix,|or|'The|Dome')|as
referenced|by|its|large|polycarbonate|lead-lined|glass|geo-dome.|

It|is|a|place|where|humans|did|not|have|to|adapt|to|the|radiation
but|society|indeed|has|changed...|a|virtual|bee|hive,|each|human
given|a|task,|each|recieving|all|that|they|need|to|survive.

Outside|the|Dome|lies|Survivors,|those|who|drift|the|desert|looking
for|a|better|life,|resistant|against|the|radiation,|due|to|their
unique|genes.

This|is|an|original|theme|based|on|many|of|those|games|and|movies
that|we|love.|Fallout,|Judge|Dredd,|and|Mad|Max|are|all|represented.
Come|join|us.|We|are|currently|under|construction,|mostly|for|the
combat/stat|system.

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Extinction:+The+Next+Age+MUSH'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Federation|2|-|Play|for|Free

Forget|about|the|orcs|and|monsters|in|other|games|-|Fed|2|has|real
challenges|for|grownups!|Like|day|trading|commodities|futures|and|
launching|an|IPO|for|your|own|company.|Like|bigger|and|better|
planets,|a|vastly|enhanced|events|system,|interactive|mobiles|and|
more.

There's|even|an|ATM|machine|on|the|far|side|of|the|Sun!

Remember,|Federation|2|is|about|commerce,|politics,|intrigue,|
power|and|money.|

Things|that|matter|in|real|life.|Federation|2|is|a|newly|rewritten
version|of|the|original|Federation|with|all|the|charm|and|humor|of|
the|original|but|adding|new|features|and|challenges|based|on|our|
15|years|of|multiplayer|game|experience|and|players|requests.|
There|are|new|ranks,|new|planets,|new|features,|new|challenges,|
new|things|to|do.

BUILD|YOUR|OWN|PLANETS|-|design|and|build|your|own|custom|planet!|
Run|your|economy,|let|others|build|factories|on|your|planet,|build
infrastructure,|build|a|spaceport,|make|a|fortune,|build|an|empire!

Come|play|Federation|2for|free|and|enjoy|the|excitement|again.
We'll|even|throw|in|a|set|of|starter|maps|of|the|Solar|System.|

Now|Announcing:

NEW|VERSION|OF|FEDTERM|ADDS|LOTS|OF|EXTRA|FEATURES

Fed|Term|is|the|new|GRAPHICAL|front|end|for|Federation|2.
This|means|players|will|be|able|to|supply|their|own|custom
avatar|picture|to|display|on|their|own|computer|as|well|as
all|the|other|players|while|in|the|game.|It|also|means|pictures|
of|your|ship.|

And|it|also|means|AutoMapping!|Really|easy|to|use,|intuitive|
automapping|built|in,|ready|to|use.|

And|it|means,|graphic|stat|displays|for|you|and|your|spaceship.
And,|a|new|multi-tabbed|pane|to|display|and|communicate|with|all
the|other|players|in|the|game|and|a|special|friends|panel.
And|many|more|useful|and|nifty|features|players|have|asked|for!

The|new|Fed|Term|makes|playing|Federation|2|more|than|a|text|
game.|It's|becoming|an|exciting|synthesis|of|Graphic|and|Text!
</pre>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
FluxWorld|is|a|Futuristic|Space|Port|and|City|set|some|300|to|500|
years|in|the|future|on|a|far|away|planet.|
Expect|some|alien|artifacts|to|be|laying|around.
|(if|not|some|aliens|themselves)

The|FluxWorld|SpacePort|itself|is|5|stories|tall|internally,|and|
there|are|many|places|to|visit|and|things|to|find|inside|the|
SpacePort|itself.|There|are|also|many|other|areas|accessible|from|
there|(indoor|and|outdoor)|Be|SURE|to|think|three-dimensionally
as|many|things|are|as|likely|to|be|up|or|down|as|they|are|east,|west,
northeast,|etc.
|
There|are|other|areas|that|are|accessible|only|by|ships|on|a|river,|
as|well|as|access|only|by|air,|and|space|to|access|the|space|station
in|orbit|as|well|as|our|two|moons|(which|are|growing|daily).

We|have|player|and|creature|kill,|bots|that|just|converse,|wearable
clothing,|mining|(to|earn|money),|repairs|to|devices|on|the|
electrical|grid|(earns|money|also)|and|more.

There|are|puzzle|areas|(Quests),|where|you|might|need|certain|objects
to|proceed.|Finding|these|hidden|areas|also|pays.

</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Forgotten|Colony|is|a|game|that|takes|place|on|the|world|of|Rukast,
a|planet|torn|between|four|major|factions|vying|for|control.

*|The|United|Rukast|American|States|-|The|decendents|of|American
settlers.
*|The|Pan-Slavic|Federation|-|Decendents|of|Russian|and|other|Slavic
nations.
*|Democratic|People's|Republic|of|Rukast|-|A|late|arrival|primarily
of|Chinese|who|arrived|via|an|invasion|fleet.
*|Atlantis|Network|-|A|neutral|hub|of|trade,|led|by|a|city|located|
at|the|bottom|of|the|ocean|which|those|on|Rukast|have|come|to|call
Atlantis,|and|the|primary|setting|of|the|Forgotten|Colony|story.|

Right|now,|the|factions|are|in|a|tenuous|state|of|balance|that|could
shift|at|any|moment.

Players|take|the|roles|of|characters|that|could|potentially|tip|the
scales|for|one|of|the|factions,|profit|from|the|conflict,|or|simply
try|to|make|it|from|day|to|day.

Rukast|has|many|stories|to|tell.|What|will|your|character's|story|be?|
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Forgotten+Colony'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Research-Oriented|MUD<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Supports/uses|MSP<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Supports/uses|MXP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>World|is|mostly|stock<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Forgotten|Dreams:|Prelude|to|Light|is|based|off
the|beloved|Battle|of|the|Immortals|code|base.|
The|staff|has|worked|hard|to|bring|new|and|custom
elements|into|the|mud|that|bring|a|custom|feel|to
the|game.|Such|things|include,|an|automated|Quest
System,|An|equipment|crafting|system,|casino,
automated|Class|specific|Quests,|numerous|custom
classes,|death|system,|etc.
While|Forgotten|Dreams|does|contain|some|of|the
golden|oldies|of|godwars|classes,|i.e.|Vampires,
Werewolves,|Demons,|and|Mages(Book/Spell|Writing),
we|also|sport|a|plethora|of|custom|classes:|Angels,
Mimics,|Kindred|of|the|East,|Hunters,|Monks,|Druids,
and|WarMages,|with|a|revamping|of|Vampires|and
Werewolves|in|the|works,|along|with|a|few|more
custom|creations.
The|World|of|Forgotten|Dreams|is|heavily|influenced
and|based|off|of|White|Wolf's|World|of|Darkness.
RP|is|highly|encouraged|and|rewarded,|though|not
necessary|to|take|part|in|the|mud.|For|those|who
prefer|PK|over|RP,|we|have|special|benefits|for
you|as|well.
The|Immortal|Staff|is|very|friendly|and|strives|to
be|as|helpful|as|possible.|We|are|very|newbie
friendly|here|at|Forgotten|Dreams.|If|you|are
looking|for|a|fun|and|original|mud|with|lots|of
flexibility|and|entertainment,|drop|by|and|give
us|a|try.

-The|Forgotten|Dreams|Immortal|Staff
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Forgotten+Dreams:+Prelude+to+Light'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Forgotten|Realms|of|Myth|is|an|RP|oriented|fantasy|mud.
We|offer|races|ranging|from|your|common|human|to|that|of|orcs,
drow|and|even|creatures|such|as|demons.||We|offer|several
base|classes|as|well|as|remort|classes|and|remort|races.
The|level|system|ranges|from|1|to|91|for|players.
Level|91|being|hero|level.||Player|suggestions
are|welcome.
</pre>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Research-Oriented|MUD<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
FurryFaire|is|a|100%|anthro,|middle-ages|roleplaying|MUCK.
It|uses|a|unique|roleplaying|system,|allowing|character|growth
and|flexibility.||Players|can|choose|from|a|variety|of|races,|groups,
nations,|and|magical|styles,|granting|them|plenty|of|options|for
character|design.
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|Canada<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
What|kind|of|mudder|are|you?|Explorer,|Socializer,|Achiever
or|Killer?|Perhaps|a|bit|of|each?|GateWay|has|something|for
you!

Explorer:|There's|plenty|to|explore|on|GateWay,|it|is|HUGE
and|there|are|endless|hidden|things|to|ferret|out|and
discover.|Almost|every|room|has|clues|and|hidden|things.
Every|guild|has|unique|abilities|to|try.|Monsters|can|be
listened|to|as|well|as|spoken|with|for|information.|Six
Domains,|Ten|guilds,|Thirty|quests,|unique|equipment|(some
with|special|abilities),|puzzles,|hidden|treasures...
there's|too|much|to|list.

Socializer:|Love|to|chat|and|kid|with|friends?|GateWay|has
always|been|a|social|mud|with|silly|people|who|do|things
like|moon|you,|shoot|sticky|arrows,|slap|you|with|"kick|me"
signs|or|send|you|a|hug|from|a|distance.|There's|a|wonderful
chapel|to|get|married|in.|Also|you|can|give|out|friendship
bracelets.|The|list|of|emotes|is|massive.|The|mail|system|is
superb|and|accessable|everywhere.

Achiever:|Want|to|get|to|the|top?|There|are|100|levels|and
if|you|make|it|that|far|you|may|qualify|to|be|an|AVATAR|and
go|for|another|100|gruelling|levels.|There|is|an|extensive
toplist|maintained|with|dozens|of|rankings|to|let|you|know
where|you|stand.

Killer:|Wanna|stand|over|the|bloody|oozing|corpse|of|another
player|that|you've|just|mangled?|Register|as|a|Player|Killer
and|hope|that|you're|tough|enough|to|take|on|the|other
registered|Player|Killers.|Because|they'll|be|waiting|for
you...

Come,|enter|the|GateWay|and|find|your|mud|waiting|for|you.

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=GateWay'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Supports/uses|MXP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|realm|of|Tirradyn|has|been|an|active|and|role-play|intensive
wonder|of|words|for|folks|from|every|lifestyle|to|participate|in
shaping|the|society|in|a|variety|of|ways|since|2004.|We|offer|over
65,000|rooms,|roughly|350|areas,|including|over|25|inns|and|boasting|
an|excess|of|2000|shops.|Our|world|is|made|of|ten|continents,|four
moons|and|another|planet,|with|areas|of|interest|located|on|all
lands.|Sea|ships|offer|transportation|between|the|continents|where
one|can|witness|the|dolphins|swimming|alongside|as|they|travel.

The|unique|role-play|council|of|Immortals,|along|with|active|players
often|offers|highly|in-depth|storylines|for|characters|to|get
involved|in,|solve|mysteries|and|be|a|part|of|molding|the|world,|for
better|or|worse.||A|questing|office|can|be|found|in|many|of|the|large
cities|for|characters|to|gain|employment|and|rewards|of|coin|as|well
as|unique|objects|for|work|performed.||Players|can|craft|their|own
armor|and|weapons,|tattoos,|jewelry|and|containers!|Our|questing
system|allows|for|spell-boosted|objects|and|custom|pets.

Many|areas|are|classified|as|Empires.|In|these|lands,|characters
are|encouraged|to|get|involved|in|the|society|and|can|climb|the
proverbial|ladder,|eventually|claiming|a|title|of|respect|or|a
reputation|that|might|instill|fear!|Like|dragons?|Youll|love|our|
NPC|Dragon|Council!

A|character|can|be|a|member|of|a|guild|and|a|religion.|The|religions
reflect|the|roster|of|Gods|and|Goddesses|of|Tirradyn.|Some|members|of
the|pantheon|are|highly|visible|and|others|prefer|to|keep|a|distance
from|the|spotlight.||As|may|be|expected,|the|differences|in|such|a
wide|world|can|present|rising|angers|and|heated|debates|that|often
turn|to|physical|outcomes.|We|have|skilled|players|in|the|art|of
role-play-combat|and|anticipate|the|option|of|PK|being|implemented|in
the|future|for|those|more|inclined|to|that|manner|of|battle.

Our|players|are|dedicated|in|that|they|are|repeat|visitors.|It|is|not
common|to|meet|a|person|in|the|IC|world|and|not|see|them|again|for|a
week.|It|is|easy|to|make|a|name|for|oneself,|positively|or|negatively,
depending|on|the|style|and|preferences|of|the|character/player.|We
appreciate|and|always|consider|ideas|submitted|by|our|players.|We|are
proud|of|the|fact|that|we|have|active|nobles|and|a|council|for|the
player|base.|TG|is|home|and|a|community|that|many|of|us|spend|the
majority|of|our|free|time|actively|seeking|to|improve|and|enhance|to
an|even|better|atmosphere.|We|welcome|visitors|to|come|and|spend|time
with|us|and|see|if|we|may|be|the|perfect|place|for|your|creativity.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Gathering...'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

game|ever,|has|been|enjoyed|by|hundreds|of|thousands|of|players

unique|rooms,|enjoy|custom|items|and|character|appearances,
hundreds|of|intelligent|creatures|to|hunt|and|interact|with,

improvements|and|expansions.

on|our|races,|professions,|organizations,|in-depth|history,|items
and|more.||http://www.play.net/gs3/info/index_of_docs.asp.

your|needs|and|wishes.|Over|1000|players|during|prime|hours|share
the|fun|every|day|-|sign|up|for|a|FREE|TRIAL|and|join|the|adventure!

<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Pure|PK<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Non-Roleplaying|Mud<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Genocide|is|not|a|typical|mud;|rather,|it|is|a|competitive|wargame.
Players|compete|against|each|other|in|"wars".||"Levels"|are|gained|by
killing|other|players|in|a|variety|of|different|war|types,|including
team|and|non-team.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Genocide'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Great|Hunt|is|an|intense|player|vs.|player|environment,|which
has|countless|modifications|of|spells,|skills,|and|melee|to|enhance
the|combat|experience.|It|is|not|uncommon|to|see|hour|long|battles
of|epic|proportion.|The|game|play|and|balance|are|finely|tuned|to
create|a|pure|adrenaline|rush|unlike|any|other|game.

Despite|the|competitive|environment,|entry|into|the|mud|is|friendly.
A|leveling|system|involving|quests|and|interaction|with|your|guild
master|will|teach|you|everything|you|need|to|know|about|the|game.
In|general|the|players|are|friendly|and|helpful.|The|Player|vs.
Player|experience|is|not|intense|until|level|50,|so|its|relatively
safe|to|learn|the|game|in|peace|until|you|are|ready|to|fight.

There|are|also|many|unique|areas,|including|'artifact|areas'|such
as|the|Tower|of|the|Necromancer,|or|the|Ogre|Cavern,|which|provide
unique|puzzles|and|extensive|mob|artificial|intelligence.|There
are|also|lots|of|custom|additions|such|as|potion|brewing.

The|admin|and|developer|team|is|dedicated,|the|server|is|stable,
and|the|mud|has|been|around|since|1994.|Roleplay|is|not|required,
but|is|certainly|welcome.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Great+Hunt'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Greatest|Generation|offers|historical|wartime|roleplay|in|the|20th
century,|from|1918|to|1945.||It|is|a|tinyplot|driven|mush|with|battle
scenarios|handled|by|code|but|with|staff|supervision.

Currently|it|is|1936,|and|the|setting|is|the|XI|International|Brigade
fighting|in|the|Spanish|Civil|War|:|one|of|the|hardest|fought|and
bitterest|wars|of|the|20th|century,|a|war|of|atrocities|and|
political|genocide,|and|a|military|testing|ground|before|the
Second|World|War|for|the|Russians,|Italians|and|Germans|whose
Condor|Legion|so|notoriously|destroyed|Guernica.

In|the|past|we|have|tackled|World|War|1,|in|the|future|we|will
move|on|to|'The|Big|One',|World|War|2.

The|combat|code|is|fairly|extensive,|and|offers|such|concepts|
as|fighter|pilots,|tankers,|riflemen,|machine|gunners,|medical
staff|and|more|besides.||Warships|are|not|currently|coded|but
we|do|plan|on|at|least|one|story|arc|involving|a|U-boat|when|we
reach|World|War|2.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Greatest+Generation'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Cimarron,|New|Mexico|-|1881

The|name|is|Spanish|for|'wild'|and|'unbroken'.|And|in|the|year|1881,
|
that's|precisely|what|it|was;|attracting|mountain|men,|outlaws,|

trappers,|gold|seekers,|traders|and|cowboys.|

By|the|1880s,|the|gold|was|running|out,|but|the|influx|of|people|

continued.|Ranchers,|townsfolk,|the|wealthy|and|the|poor.|Cimarron|is|

imbued|with|them|all.|Pueblo,|Apache|and|Navajo|roamed|the|land.

With|the|Sangre|de|Cristo|(Blood|of|Christ)|Mountain|range|in|its|

shadow,|Cimarron|lays|seemingly|serene|from|a|distance,|but|up|close,

it|teams|with|life.|Welcome|and|join|us.|

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Guns+of+Cimarron'>report|listing|problems</a>

<pre>
"It|was|dark|times,|Harry.|Dark|times."
|||-|Rubeus|Hagrid|to|Harry|Potter

And|indeed|that|is|just|what|is|the|current|situation.|As|the
students|return|to|Hogwarts,|there|are|whispers|on|the|wind|about|the
possible|return|of|the|Dark|Lord|Voldemort.|Whispers|that|are|ignored
by|most,|including|the|Ministry|of|Magic.|Minister|Cornelius|Fudge
has|stated|in|public|broadcasts|on|the|Wizard|Wireless|Networks,|that
"Mister|Potter's|claims|that|He|Who|Shall|Not|Be|Named|is|close|to
returning|are|nothing|more|than|the|creative|imagination|of|a|child
desperately|seeking|attention.|We|should|instead|be|be|focusing|our
efforts|on|the|apprehension|of|escaped|murderer|Sirius|Black."

With|Sirius|Black|still|at|large,|and|the|rumors|of|the|possible
return|of|Voldemort,|it|seems|the|wizarding|world|stands|on|the|event
horizon|of|the|start|of|dark|times.|But,|only|time|will|tell.

Staring|in|1994,|in|the|summer,|HP:|Into|The|Fire|seeks|to|bring|the
fun|of|the|Harry|Potter|world|to|you.||

So|stop|by,|check|us|out,|and|ask|questions.||:)

</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
||||||||||||||||WARNING:|ADULT|CONTENT

|||||It's|not|known|when|or|how|the|Island|known|as|Hideaway
came|into|exsistance.|It|was|simply|there,|exsisting|in|a
state|outside|of|time|itself.|Every|so|often,|in|different
places|in|the|world,|the|boundaries|of|the|Island|would
encroach|into|one|of|the|many|worlds|in|the|multiverse|and|a
portal|would|open.|Sometimes|for|days,|sometimes|for|only
moments.|Of|course,|it|was|inevitable|that|eventually|people
would|fall|into|those|portals|and|end|up|upon|the|Island.

|||||At|first,|only|a|few|appeared,|many|baffled|as|they
discovered|only|females|seemed|to|be|able|to|exsist|on|the
Island.|The|men|who|found|themselves|upon|the|island|were
changed|by|the|place's|magic.|Those|first|arrivals|found|the
fishing|around|the|island|to|be|plentiful|and|prosperous,|and
so|a|small|fishing|village,|the|village|of|Hideaway,|was|born
there|in|the|sheltered|cove.|Over|the|years,|however,|more|and
more|people|began|to|appear,|the|appearance|of|portals|in|the
real|world|beginning|to|grow|more|frequent.|The|population
began|to|grow,|forming|and|shaping|into|an|open,|friendly
environment|for|all|kinds|of|women,|with|all|kinds|of
different|interests.|Now,|a|few|hundred|years|after|the|first
few|people|found|themselves|transported|to|Hideaway,|the
little|village|has|grown|into|a|bustling|town,|full|of|lively
activity|and|fun.

|||||HideawayMUSH|is|a|place|designed|to|be|a|safe,|open|and
friendly|place|for|lesbian|interaction.|We|welcome|female|and
male|players|alike,|but|for|thematic|reasons|we|only|allow
female|characters.|This|is|ment|to|be|a|place|where|womyn|can
go|to|explore|various|aspects|of|themselves|and|generally|have
fun|in|a|roleplaying|setting.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Hideaway+MUSH'>report|listing|problems</a>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Hogwarts:|School|of|Witchcraft|and|Wizardry|is|a
completely|roleplay|world|based|on|JK|Rowling's|
classic|Harry|Potter|world.

The|game|itself|is|based|in|an|alternate|reality
to|that|of|the|book,|meaning|Harry|Potter,|and|
other|characters|from|the|books|never|existed.

The|MU|uses|attributes,|abilities,|and|recorded
spells|for|each|character.|This|creates|uniqueness
from|character|to|character.

Characters|can|play|quiditch,|excel|in|areas,|
create|their|own|spells,|etc.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Hogwarts:+School+of+Witchcraft+and+Wizardry'>report|listing|problems</a>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|stock<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|and|Adult-Level|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Hey|everyone,

Some|of|you|may|remember|me|-|Jace.
I|ran|this|mud|several|years|back,|but|had|to|take|it|down|because|I
had|other|life|issues|pressing|me,|and|I|needed|a|break|from|coding.
Well,|it's|back,|and|I'm|hoping|to|get|some|interest|in|it|going.
It's|a|heavily|modified|GodWars,|I|forget|which|base|it|originally
comes|from,|but|it's|not|like|any|other|GodWars|out|there.
We|feature:

*|Custom|coded|fight|code.
*|No|more|stances,|martial|arts|instead|(still|being|
||modified,|but|fully|integrated).
*|Only|custom|classes,|not|a|whole|bunch|right|now,|but|
||working|on|more.
*|Options|for|Cybernetics|or|Magic|Tattoos|to|help|customize
||your|character.
*|Custom|coded|quest|code,|still|adding|more|features|to|it.
*|Currently|working|on|a|random|item|generator|for|when|you|kill
||mobiles,|for|treasure,|you|know?

***|A|FULLY|WORKING|OLC|INCLUDING|MOBPROGS|***
**|Currently|looking|to|hire|builders|**

Please,|stop|on|by|and|say|hi|if|I'm|around,|or|leave|a|note|on|the
message|boards.|I'd|love|to|see|some|of|my|old|players,|and|new|ones
too!

-|Jace|-
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Infinite+Dreams'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

to|create|nearly|anything|they|desire|and|join

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Pay-Per|Play|Mud<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Ironclaw|Online|is|an|anthromorphic|RPG|set|at
the|cusp|of|change|on|the|island-continent|of|Calabria.

Many|different|sentient|races,|cultures,|and|societies
are|converging|upon|the|city|of|Triskellian.
As|a|player,|you|will|start|with|humble|beginnings,|only
to|become|involved|in|machinations|as|each|noble|house
vies|for|control|and|the|guilds|strive|for|power.

Which|side|will|you|take?
Will|you|throw|your|fate|in|with|the|Bisclavret,
becoming|a|mercenary|hoping|for|riches|and|glory?

Can|you|stand|against|the|Avoirdupois|warriors,
in|their|staggering|numbers|and|unyielding|formations?

And|what|of|the|mysterious|Doloreaux,
with|the|rumors|that|they|may|have|unlocked|the|secrets
of|the|wizard-kings|of|yore?

Or|can|you|really|hope|to|remain|neutral|as|the|destiny
of|the|world|is|decided?

Join|us|on|this|epic|adventure|in|a|world|filled|with|many
people|stretching|their|imaginations|to|the|limit.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Ironclaw+Online'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Supports/uses|MSP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|||||This|Tolkien-based|mud|has|been|around|for|as|long
as|Mordor|has|existed.||In|fact,|some|of|the|original
coders|of|Mordor|still|develop|for|Isengard.||With|a
wonderful|and|extensive|monster,|item,|and|character
database,|this|mud|is|famous|among|Mordor|fans|and|non-
Mordor|fans|alike|for|its|diversity|and|it's|mix|of
exciting|combat|and|depth|of|its|monster|and|item|database.

|||||The|combat|system|is|loosely|based|on|D&D|and|AD&D,
and|people|familiar|with|the|combat|system|of|these|famous
games|will|no|doubt|enjoy|the|experience|of|playing|on
Isengard.||There|are|constant|improvements|and|new|areas
being|added.

|||||With|the|addition|of|clans,|guilds,|and|player|shops,
this|mud|has|quite|a|bit|of|depth|while|maintaining|the
simplicity|that|it|has|always|been|known|for.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Isengard'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
1066|is|considered|one|of|those|dates|in|Medieval|England
which|is|difficult|to|forget.|At|the|start|of|1066,|England|
was|ruled|by|Edward|the|Confessor.|By|the|end|of|the|year,|
a|Norman|-|William|the|Conqueror|-|was|king|after|defeating|
Edward's|successor,|Harold,|at|the|Battle|of|Hastings.|With
three|kings|in|one|year,|a|legendary|battle|in|October|and
|a|Norman|in|charge|of|England,|it|is|little|wonder|that|people
rarely|forget|the|year|1066.|Many|historians|view|1066|
as|the|start|of|Medieval|England...And|this|is|where|our
|story|starts.|Come|join|the|lands|of|change|and|the|dark|ages...
Isle|of|Wight|is|a|old|World|of|Darkness|roleplaying|mush.

Currently|we|allow:|Mortal,|Mortal+,|Vampire,|Changeling,|
Shifter,|and|wraith.

We|are|currently|in|a|/soft/|opening,|featuring|open|chargen.|

Come|and|join|the|fun|today!
</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Jungle|Mud|is|a|revived|ROM2.4|MUD,|modified,|and|under|new|
ownership|(Formerlly|owned|by|creators|Lanka|and|Talon).|The|Jungle|
Mud|is|made|up|of|animal|races.|Players|level|from|1-100,|then|have|
the|option|to|remort|(become|reincarnated)|into|a|different|species.|
New|species|become|available|as|the|amount|of|times|you|remort|
increases.|There|are|benefits|available|to|specific|species.|Due|to|
hostname|change,|pbase|has|decreased,|however|building|back|up.|Added|
three|more|zones|and|a|new|clan.|Clans|are|open|to|new|members||few
restrictions.|NEWBIE|FRIENDLY!|Help|files|galore!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Jungle+Mud'>report|listing|problems</a>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
This|MUD|is|named|Jusenkyo|Mordor|for|reasons|which|are|unlikely|to
become|clear|again|at|the|moment.|Suffice|it|to|say,|the|action|of
the|game|takes|place|neither|in|Jusenkyo|nor|Mordor.|Instead|it
takes|place|in|a|completely|unique|world|held|loosely|together|by
conventions|of|convenience,|innumerable|influences|from|the|realms|of
sci-fi|and|fantasy|and|just|a|touch|of|sanity|added|in|a|vain|attempt
to|keep|plots|moving|forward|in|a|line|slightly|less|circuitous|than
a|M.C.|Escher|painting.|

The|setting|for|Jusenkyo|Mordor|is|the|floating|islands|of|Eraniss
and|the|surface|continent|below.|New|characters|first|arrive|in|the
crystal|city|of|Girralatia|through|the|Nexus.|The|Nexus|is|a|strange
mass|of|chaotic|magic|at|a|point|near|many|other|worlds|or|universes.
It|is|the|Nexus|that|plucks|characters|from|their|homeworld|and
flings|them|into|this|one|while|subjugating|them|to|undesired
physical|changes|and|often|not|even|allowing|death|as|an|escape.


Eraniss|is|a|tumultuous|place,|with|imported|technology,|magic|and
ideas|beginning|to|spread|in|a|world|where|native|magic|is|prevalent.
Constant|new|arrivals|add|to|the|growing|number|of|denizens,|diverse
in|their|culture,|ideas,|abilities|and|desires.

Jusenkyo|Mordor|is|a|roleplaying|MUD|(originally|based|on|the|Mordor
code|base|though|the|combat|system,|spells,|stats,|etc|have|been
removed|as|the|focus|has|shifted|purely|to|free|form|RP).||JM|is
comprised|of|a|small|community|of|players|most|of|whom|take|turns|in
GMing|plot|events|and/or|building/administrating|a|part|of|the|game
world.||The|result|is|a|unique|roleplaying|environment|where|everyone
contributes|to|the|evolution|of|the|game.

To|help|cut|down|on|any|OOC|chatter|within|the|MUD|itself,|RP
sessions|are|usually|organized|on|the|MUD's|&lt;a
href="irc://eldrasia.dyndns.org:6667/Botmud"&gt;IRC|channel&lt;/a&gt;
(eldrasia.lunarnet.org|6667|channel|#botmud)|so|new|players|may|log
in|to|find|that|no|one|appears|to|be|on|the|MUD|at|the|moment.||That
doesn't|mean|players|aren't|around|for|RP,|though!||New|players|are
encouraged|to|pop|into|the|IRC|channel|as|well|as|peruse|the|&lt;a
href="http://jm.eraniss.org"&gt;online|wiki&lt;/a&gt;|which
has|information|regarding|the|game|world,|character|bios,|recent|RP
logs|and|other|useful|information.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Jusenkyo+Mordor'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Kingdoms3|is|a|web|based|strategy|game|built|where|you,|as
a|kingdom|ruler,|must|build|your|kingdom|from|the|ground
up,|while|at|the|same|time|compteting|against|other
players.|Currently|we|have|5|different|races|you|can|choose
from|when|joining.|We|have|Humans,|Elves,|Demons,|Beasts,
and|Draconians.|Each|race|has|completely|different
buildings,|military|units,|and|spells|to|choose|from.

Kingdoms3|supports|a|full|market|system,|as|well|as|a|clans
system|which|comes|complete|with|a|ranking|system|and
private|forums|dedicated|to|the|clan|alone.|Clan|creators
are|able|to|create|clan|parent|topics|as|they|wish.

Kingdoms3|is|open|and|ready|to|accept|players.|Come|check
us|out,|we're|averaging|30-40|players|on|during|the|day.
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Koitola|is|an|RPG|based|in|it's|own|Fantasy|world,|players|are|
placed|in|a|world|as|mere|objects|of|the|game|and|will|be|
one|who|can|save|the|world',|each|player|makes|a|difference,
|but|not|a|large|one,|it|takes|make|small|acts|to|take|notice
|in|the|world.

Monsters|are|not|based|on|level,|you|must|know|what|monsters|
you|can|fight,|don't|just|rush|in|because|an|opponent|says|
'Level|1'|Study|your|surroundings,|talk|to|friends,|and|just|
listen|to|the|name,|if|it|sounds|like|it|would|be|a|tough|
fight,|it|probably|will|be.

Each|enemy|has|their|own|level|system,|so|a|level|1|snake,|
will|never|be|as|easy|to|kill|as|a|level|1|Blood|Orc.|You|
need|to|watch|what|is|going|on|before|you|fight|them.

There|are|several|races|to|choose|from,|each|with|their|own|
weaknesses,|there|are|no|restricted|classes|or|races,|but|
some|classes|will|benefit|from|one|race|that|another|one|
might|not.|We|are|always|looking|to|add|things|to|the|game,|
make|it|better,|and|if|a|certain|feature|is|disliked|by|a|
large|quantity|of|players,|we|will|generally|change|it,|if|
it|is|for|the|good|of|the|players.

Welcome,|to|Koitola!

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Koitola'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
||Latitude|MUCK|is|a|purely|social|world|geared|toward|total
freedom|of|speech|and|expression.||There|are|no|monsters|to
fight,|but|there|are|endless|outlets|for|your|creativity|and
your|thirst|for|socialization.

When|you|log|on|to|Latitude|MUCK|you'll|be|presented|with|an
open,|relaxing|atmosphere|of|chat|and|light|roleplay,|but
truly,|the|world|is|yours|to|mold,|the|Latitude|management's
highest|policy|is|to|not|interfere|with|your|creative|efforts,
or|your|expression.

Log|on|and|create|your|own|rooms,|objects,|areas,|and|even
software|to|help|the|MUCK|function|and|give|it|additional
features.||The|Latitude|management|is|very|relaxed|with|areas
it|will|link|to,|so|you|can|freely|create|buildings,|shops,
homes,|forums,|or|anything|your|heart|desires|right|within|the
main|areas|of|the|MUCK.

Why|not|stop|by|and|have|some|fun?
</pre>

thousands|of|locations.

your|own|legend.

Players|run|the|cities,|guilds,|clans,|households.

Immortals|and|heroes|interact|with|the|playerbase|at|all|times.

Arc|storylines|are|developed|thorughout|the|year.

Extensive|engine|development|and|world|expansion|has|happened|each|and|every|
year|and|will|continue|to|happen.

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
LevensMOO|is|based|on|the|novel|Imajica|
(Imagica|in|other|countries)|by|Clive|barker.
We|started|by|reproducing|the|5th|Domain|of|
Imajica,|which|is|Earth.|
Specifically|the|city|of|London|(England).

Players|do|not|need|to|know|the|backgrounds|
of|Imajica,|but|it|helps|a|lot.

LevensMOO|spoken|in|dutch,|is|the|same|way|
as|we|would|say|levensmoe.
Levensmoe|means|tired|of|life.
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Player|Reviews|Refused<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Lost|Kingdoms|is|a|hack|n'|slash|based|mud.||The|emphasis
is|on|killing|mobs|for|eq,|as|eq|plays|a|large|part|in
character|strengths.||LK|is|also|a|limited|PK|mud,|and|
this|is|chosen|at|the|time|you|reach|level|30|out|of|50|
mortal|levels.||Currently|we|are|only|beta|testing|as|we
only|have|roughly|10|zones|completely|done,|with|10|more|
planned.||LK|is|all|original|except|for|the|sewers|under|
the|start|town,|that|was|modified|from|stock.||So|if|
you|want|to|play|and|possibly|build,|then|come|check|us|
out.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Lost+Kingdoms'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

and|takes|place|on|Lusitania|only|8|years|after|the|colony|is
formed.|The|descolada|has|not|yet|struck|its|people.

Create|a|character|and|choose|a|profession.|Also,|this|MOO|is|
part|of|the|InterMoo|Channel|System,|linking|several|MOOs|
together|through|a|chat|channel.

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
New|York|is|not|your|average|city.|It|is|a|world|where|the|strange|is|
commonplace,|magic|is|mundane|and|wonders|sometimes|slip|beneath|
notice.|It|is|a|city|brimming|with|heroes,|villains|and|everything|in|
between.|Some|of|these|people|have|their|eyes|set|on|global|salvation|
(or|conquest),|playing|roles|in|galactic|diplomacy|or|challenging|
otherworldly|horrors.|But|there|is|another|layer|to|the|superhuman|
community,|the|ones|who|call|New|York|their|home,|their|territory|or|
their|turf.|The|ones|who|do|not|play|a|role|in|the|galactic|
happenings,|the|world|events|or|even|the|national|news.|These|are|the|
Heroes|of|New|York.|Whether|these|are|heroes|to|the|citizens|of|the|
Big|Apple,|or|heroes|of|their|own|selfish|goals|is|up|to|them.

And|here|on|the|streets|of|the|city,|there|are|goals|a-plenty.|The|
students|of|the|Xavier's|Institute|for|Gifted|Youngsters|only|want|to|
explore|and|enjoy|the|city,|while|the|dangerous|Friends|of|Humanity|
want|to|end|the|genetic|anomoly|that|is|mutantkind.|The|Morlocks|want|
only|to|survive|and|the|Brotherhood|of|Mutants|wants|to|dominate|the
city.|Members|of|AIM|want|their|own|piece|of|the|world,|while|the
Heroes|for|Hire|want|a|slice|of|the|pie.

The|world|fears|what's|different,|and|that|often|amounts|to|
mutantkind.|Most|people|feel|that|these|are|non-humans,|a|species|to|
be|watched,|feared|and|controlled|to|the|best|of|their|abilities.|The|
political|climate|is|unfriendly|for|these|mutants,|but|smiles|on|
heroes|that|are|(or|were|once)|their|own:|Supersoldiers|and|those|who|
received|their|powers|from|an|accident|are|sometimes|untouched|by|
public|scrutiny|while|still|others|can't|help|but|always|be|in|the|
spotlight|in|the|worst|way|possible.|What|is|to|come|of|this|city,|
from|this|tension|and|uneasiness?

This|is|Marvel:|Heroes|of|New|York.|This|is|a|game|based|on|the|street
level|Marvel|Comics|characters,|before|the|happenings|of|House|of|M,
and|not|necessarily|following|in|the|canon's|footsteps.|Here,|it|is
you|who|helps|write|the|story.



</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Marvel+MUCK+-+Heroes+of+New+York'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Educational|MUD<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Meadows|MUCK|is|a|North|American|wildlife|roleplaying|haven|set|in|a
fictional|area|of|the|country|during|the|early|1900s,|featuring
wolves,|cougars,|rabbits,|cats,|dogs,|foxes,|horses,|and|various
other|species|that|would|inhabit|the|woodland|areas|featured|here.
While|there|is|a|small|degree|of|human|presence,|the|focus|will|be
on|the|interactions|between|the|animals.|Originality|and|creativity
are|embraced.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Meadows+MUCK'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|Come|join|the|rich|the|famous|and|the|dead|in|the|old|city|of|Monaco.
|
Set|below|a|fictional|French|countryside,|lies|the|very|busy|and|hectic
city|of|Monaco.|Stone|buildlings|with|red|tiled|roofs|line|the|streets|with
the|occasional|old|world|villa|looming|over|older,|short|stone|buildings.
|
The|city|is|a|tourist|attraction|and|the|playground|of|the|very|wealthy,|but
what|lurks|behind|an|old|stone|alley,|or|hides|in|the|cliffs|looking|over|the
Mediterranean|Sea?|Do|you|dare|to|look?
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|||Miami|by|Night,|up|since|January|of|1997,|is|a|World|of|Darkness(tm)
MUSH|set|in|Miami,|Florida,|in|the|first|decade|of|the|21st|Century.|We
support|the|following|second|edition|systems:|Vampire:|The|Masquerade(tm),
Mage:|The|Ascension(tm),|and|Werewolf:|The|Apocalypse(tm).|

|||Our|Staff|prides|itself|on|its|fairness,|and|players|can|be|assured
that|the|rules|are|enforced|equally.|Each|player|is|just|as|important|as
every|other|player|and|staff|will|not|step|in|to|retcon|or|rewrite|scenes|to
benefit|any|particular|player's|'story'|over|another's.|If|you|like|a|game
where|scenes|are|not|prescripted|and|you|will|not|be|prevented|from|action
as|long|as|you|have|IC|justification,|then|Miami|may|be|the|place|for|you.

|||There|are|no|quotas|for|Supers|(vampires,|shifters,|mages,|etc.)|on
Miami|by|Night|in|order|to|give|players|the|chance|to|play|the|type|of
character|they|want,|although|each|player|is|restricted|to|one|Super.|Mortal
character|creation|uses|Mortal|Peer|stats,|meaning|a|starting|stats|mortal
has|the|same|starting|attributes|and|abilities|as|a|neonate|vampire.
Transfer|characters|from|other|MUSHes|in|the|same|general|timeline|are
accepted,|provided|we|can|verify|stats.|More|information|on|character
creation|and|transfer|can|be|found|on|our|web|site|or|by|logging|into
Miami|by|Night.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Miami+by+Night'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
It|is|common|for|a|MUD|to|die|-|it|is|almost|unheard|of|for|a|MUD|to|
make|a|comeback,|let|alone|TWO!
But|Midian:|Funnest|Mud|of|All|is|doing|just|that.

Midian|began|in|1991,|before|surfin'|the|'net|was|a|phrase.|In|its|
first|incarnation,|it|lasted|until|1994,|when|its|server|went|down.
During|that|time|it|was|highly|original|and|well-respected.||For|8|
years,|it|existed|only|as|a|memory|on|Yahoo|groups|-|until|as|much|of|
the|original|code|could|be|brought|back|together.|It|was|restored|in|
2001,|died|again|in|2003,|and|is|back|yet|again|as|of|December|2005.

Things|that|make|Midian|stand|out:

||||*|It|uses|LPC|code.|LPMuds|were|very|common|in|the|early|1990s.||
Now|MUDs|have|much|more|sophisticated|underlying|code.|But|what|made
Midian|great|were|the|crazy|ideas.

||||*|The|essence|of|fun.|Midian|is|kooky|and|fun.|One|important
social|tradition|of|Midian|is|the|Midian|MUDwedding.||You|haven't
seen|a|real|MUDwedding|until|you've|been|to|one|on|Midian.||
Note:|MUDweddings|are|not|to|be|taken|seriously,|although|
the|crossover|to|RL|HAS|happened|on|Midian!

||||*|But|most|importantly,|it's|the|players|and|the|ideas|they|
bring|to|the|MUD|that|make|it|so|different.||We|have|been|up|
again|only|for|two|weeks,|and|already|have|many|of|our|old|
players|and|wizzes|back|--|Midian|has|incredible|loyalty,|
despite|being|down|for|10|of|the|past|fifteen|years!

Come|see|what|makes|us|the|"Funnest|MUD|of|All"|(according|to|Galah)
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Midian'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
With|terraforming|becoming|a|popular|event,|much|of|the|galaxy|is
occupied|in|the|year|2395.||The|humans|have|divided|themselves|into
three|alliances,|mostly|based|on|strict|political|ideals.||Even|after
a|long-lasting|bloody|war|against|the|aggresive|alien|species
designated|WEH-83D,|renamed|Praelor,|the|people|are|still|divided.
Space|travel|through|wormholes|is|as|common|as|air|travel|was|in|the
20th|century,|and|it's|rare|for|a|person|not|to|own|a|ship|and|bounce
from|planet|to|planet|at|their|leisure,|for|there|is|much|to|do|in
Miriani.||From|shopping|for|clothes|to|hauling|asteroids|for|cash|to
space|combat|missions|for|experience,|few|find|themselves|with
nothing|to|do.||Gaining|the|experience|of|small|combat|is|essential
for|young|pilots,|because|there|is|always|talk|of|the|Praelor
returning|to|claim|Miriani|space|as|their|own.||Vicious|creatures
that|will|let|nothing|stand|in|their|way,|the|Praelor|have|little
regard|for|lives|that|are|not|their|own.||Will|you|be|a|pilot|brave
enough|to|get|scratched|up,|sacrifice|a|ship|and|some|sanity?

Miriani|is|now|in|open-beta.|Anyone|can|join|and|create|a|character.
Once|complete,|Miriani|will|be|a|MOO|with|a|rich|backstory,|beautiful
and|original|planets|to|explore,|and|many|fun|ways|to|earn|credits|or
points.|So|come|check|us|out!|Make|some|friends,|make|some|enemies
and|just|generally|have|a|good|time.|We|have|very|active|and|friendly
staff|who|are|willing|to|answer|all|of|your|questions|and|help|you
get|started.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Miriani'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
A|Moment|in|Tyme|(MiT)|is|one|of|the|oldest|Wheel|of|Time|
based|Muds|on|the|Internet.||Since|1994,|our|coders|and|
builders|have|been|working|hard|to|bring|in|unique|new|
features|and|our|own|original|areas.||MiT|is|currently|on|
our|second|major|revision|of|the|codebase,|and|our|areas|
are|all|completely|original.||At|A|Moment|in|Tyme,|we|have|
a|dedicated|playerbase|and|an|excellent,|committed|staff|of|
Immortals.||We|have|unique|systems|in|place|to|rank|
players'|mastery|in|swordplay|and|channeling|(Wheel|of|
Time's|magic|system).
|
A|Moment|in|Tyme|is|set|on|a|Timeline|that|is|based|on|the
first|six|books.|After|that,|though,|Tyme|has|broken|away
to|become|a|mirror|world|of|the|books.|The|Bowl|of|the|Winds
has|been|found|and|used,|breaking|the|long|winter.|Elayne
has|returned|to|Andor|and|taken|the|Throne.|After|a|long
struggle,|Analinde|su|Riaten|Rie|now|controls|Cairhien
with|Rand|al'Thor's,|the|Dragon|Reborn,|approval.|
|
The|White|Tower|has|split,|but|after|a|Black|Tower|raid|
against|the|Aes|Sedai,|Elaida|has|been|kidnapped|and|now|
awaits|trial|before|the|newly|reunified|Tower.|Who|will|be
Amyrlin|now?|Already|several|woman|are|seeking|the|title.

And|the|Seanchan?|Tarabon,|Arad|Doman,|and|Altara|are
all|victims|of|the|Ever|Victorious|Army.|The|High|Lady
Suroth|invaded,|and|conquered|Murandy,|instead|of|reaching
into|Amadicia.|Because|of|this,|High|Lady|Ilorin|Shayndel|
Paendrag,|fourth|in|line|for|the|Crystal|Throne,|has|
officially|settled|into|the|Panarch's|Palace|and|taken
control|of|the|Hailene.|Who|will|stop|them?|Word|is|that|
a|mercenary|group|called|the|Heron|Company|is|being|raised
to|retake|Arad|Doman...
|
A|Moment|in|Tyme|is|a|RP-intensive|MUD.|We|have|an|RPexp
system|which|rewards|RP|by|giving|EXP|based|on|emotes.|
Combat|Code|is|currently|offline,|as|it|is|being|completely
remodified|and|built|from|the|ground|up.|It|will|utilize
50|different|body|parts|as|well|as|have|very|realistically
coded|forms|with|special|procedures.|

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=A+Moment+in+Tyme'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Non-Roleplaying|Mud<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
MTBS|Nations|at|War|(NAW)|starts|out|simple|enough,|but|is|deceivingly
addictive.|Played|in|real-time,|players|(mayors)|build|a|city|that
will|stand|the|tests|of|time|by|climbing|to|the|top|ranks|of|the
game.

The|only|way|to|do|this|is|to|research|new|technologies,|build
armies|and|structures,|and|ultimately|attack|and|defend|against
other|players.|The|game|also|features|allegiances,|resource
sharing,|live|chat,|and|a|private|messaging|system|during|game|play.

All|you|need|to|join|NAW|is|either|a|Mozilla|Firefox|or|Internet
Explorer|browser,|and|no|additional|plug-ins|or|software|is
required.||Add|to|the|fun|and|encourage|your|friends|to|play!|It's
all|free.

NOTE:|This|website|can't|link|directly|to|the|game.||Go|to
mtbs3D.com's|main|site,|and|select|"MTBS|Nations|at|War"|to
play.

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=MTBS+Nations+at+War'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<center>
<form|method="POST"|action="/mud-bin/adv_search.cgi">
<input|type="hidden"|name="Mode"|value="ADVANCED">
<table|border=0|cellspacing=3|cellpadding=3>
<tr><td|colspan=2|align="center">
<font|size=-1>

<center>
<b>Advanced|Search:</b>|Keyphrase|Options
<br><br>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Valinor|is|a|Brazilian|roleplay-friendly|MUD|focused|on|the
Tolkienian|legendarium.|It|is|one|of|the|few|MUDs|in|Portuguese
and|the|only|Brazilian|MUD|dedicated|exclusively|to|the|work|of
J.R.R.|Tolkien.|There|is|a|strict|separation|between|IC|and|OOC
actions|and|the|system|is|designed|to|provide|a|rich|roleplay
experience|for|the|PCs|and|enforce|a|consistent|behavior|for|the
NPCs.|Players|are|also|encouraged|to|submit|roleplay|logs|of|its
character's|adventures|and|findings.
</pre>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
MultiMUD|is|one|of|the|very|few|French|MUDs.
Its|code|and|universe|are|all|original.|The
basic|commands|are|slightly|inspired|by
CircleMUD.|The|numerous|realms|of|the
MultiMonde|are|awaiting|you|and|offer|you
lots|of|game|possibilities:
-|random|quests
-|highly|customizable|clans
-|crafting|guilds
-|seven|magic|schools,|many|original|skills
-|randomly|generated|special|items
-|ships,|pirate|ships|and|mobs,|cannons,|fishing...
-|seasons,|vegetals,|planting,|harvesting
-|regular|imm|driven|quests
-|player|kingdoms|with|shops,|ressources,|harbours...
And|the|list|is|growing|regularly.
Don't|hesitate|and|come|to|the|amazing|lands|where
everything|is|possible.

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Multi+MUD'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Player|Reviews|Refused<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Within|these|confines|you'll|find|those|Worlds|you|would|love|to|
be|a|part|of.|This|is|a|MUSH|for|the|imaginative|person|and|
good|roleplayer;|someone|whom|enjoys|reading|books|and|roleplay|
will|find|this|experience|an|adventure|that|changes|on|a|daily|
basis.|There|are|no|limitations|to|the|experience|you|can|have|
within|the|game.||

This|is|not|going|to|be|the|typical|Roleplaying|MUSH,|solely|
focused|on|one|World|and|time.|We|do|love|various|Universes|and|
would|like|to|play|them|all,|and|in|the|same|MUSH.|More|than|
that,|to|play|them|all|and|in|different|times.|What|worlds|are|
we|speaking|of?|At|the|moment,|they|would|be|three:

*|Tolkiens|Middle-Earth|(The|Silmarillion,|The|Lord|of|the|
Rings|and|related|books).
*|M.Z.|Bradleys|Avalon|and|Camelot|(The|Mists|of|Avalon).
*|Martins|Westeros|(A|Song|of|Ice|and|Fire).

We|want|to|build|a|MUSH|focused|on|high|quality|roleplay,|
book|verse,|and|aimed|at|fleshing|out|the|stories|of|those|
times|a|bit|more,|not|changing|them.|Staying|true|to|the|
books|we|love|will|be|a|major|concern,|and|although|members|
are|not|required|to|be|experts,|a|certain|respect|and|
enthusiasm|for|the|works|of|these|authors|should|be|common.|

For|those|who|have|read|the|books|and|wished|there|were|more|
detail|in|the|stories,|and|all|those|blanks|filled|with|
dialogue|and|feelings|are|welcome|to|join|and|bring|it|all|
to|life.|At|the|moment|we|search|for|good|players|(and|
coders|and|builders!),|to|build|a|genuine|and|splendid|site.|
There|is|a|lot|of|available|Book|Chars|waiting|for|you|to|
play|them.|

Feel|free|to|drop|around|and|ask|any|question|you|might|have.



</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=My+MUSH'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|25|-|49<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
After|being|down|for|several|years,|Mystical|Mud|has
returned!|For|those|of|you|who|remember|it,|
the|mud|has|been|restored|prior|to|V.4.0,|and|is|the
mud|we|all|knew|and|loved.|Within|2|days|of
relaunch,|we|had|30|people|back,|all|spread
by|word|of|mouth.|

For|those|of|you|brand-new|to|Mystical,|we|are
a|heavily|modified|CircleMud,|with|a|fantasy/medieval
theme.|We|are|very|newbie|friendly,|and|offer|a|wide
variety|of|classes/races,|and|an|extensive|selection
of|zones,|skills,|and|spells.|We|offer|limited|PK
to|those|who|wish|to|PvP.|We|have|a|mature|theme,|and
a|staff|of|very|skilled|and|dedicated|builders
and|coders|who|continually|make|advances|and|
improvements.|Roleplaying|events,|such|as|
Quests,|offer|a|system|by|which|the|purchase
of|special|equipment|may|be|obtained|(using
Quest|Points),|and|social|events|are|held
regularly|for|both|fun|and|quest|points|as
well.|Here,|friends|made|last|a|lifetime,
as|the|MUD|has|many|players|who|have|been|here
longer|than|a|decade.

In|the|realm|of|Mystical,|Darknights|wage|war|against
Paladins,|Dragons|soar|the|skies,|and|everywhere
the|struggle|to|gain|power|goes|on.|Alone,|or
with|your|comrades,|you|may|seek|power|and|glory
with|your|blade,|your|spells,|or|both.|Let|the
death|cry|of|your|foes|be|your|battle|song.|
Adventure,|explore,|battle,|and|overcome!

Welcome|to|Mystical|Mud!
Stay|awhile...
Stay...FOREVER!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Mystical+Mud'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<pre>
NarutoMUD|was|born|out|of|a|passion|for|Naruto|and|lack|of|quality
anime|or|Naruto|themed|MUDs.|With|years|of|hard|work,|from|many
talented|people,|it|is|our|pleasure|to|let|players|enjoy|this|labor
of|love.

We|welcome|Naruto|fans,|and|non-fans,|to|enjoy|playing|in|our|
immersive|world.|Weve|painstaking|constructed|a|world|which|
feels|like|a|digital|slice|of|Japan.|Weve|always|ensured|our|
game|has|the|depth|required|to|be|in|the|Naruto|theme,|and|do|
justice|to|a|genre|of|MUD|which|typically|is|scoffed|at.

It|would|be|our|honor|for|you|to|try|us|out|and|see|for|
yourself,|we|strive|for|an|Everything|must|be|cool|approach,|
and|I|think|youll|see|why|when|you|log|in.|

<pre>
|Online|since|1994|-|NetherWorld|is|an|old|and|long-standing|mud,
but|remains|exciting|with|all|of|these|features|and|more!

*|15|Starting|Classes|and|20|starting|Races
*|Remort|and|Reincarnation|Systems|allow|Multi-Classing|and
||offer|over|400|additional|special|races,|some|of|which|is
||in|the|form|of|progressive|race|chains.
*|3|fully|populated|continents|&|oceans|create|a|complete|world
*|Role-Playing|Clans|with|restricted|PKilling|and|clan|rankings
*|Automated|Questing-Save|up|points|to|Customize|Your|Characters
*|99%|of|the|Equipment|that|loads|has|randomly|generated
||stats,|and|a|small|chance|to|load|as|'Rare'|or|'Socketed'
*|Random|meteor|showers|scatter|powerful|and|rare|
||GEMS|for|inserting|into|eq|with|sockets|or|slots
*|Immortals|run|online|games|like|trivia|and|mini-quests
*|Consult|a|detailed|system|of|helps|to|assist|you|in
||understanding|our|mud.
*|The|immortal|staff|welcomes|player|input|to|make|
||Nether|World|entertaining,|fresh,|and|enjoyable!

Our|goal|is|to|provide|a|balanced|MUD|that|caters|to|both|new
and|experienced|Mudders|alike.|So|whether|its|Hack'n'Slash,|Role
Playing,|or|just|chatting,|come|on|by|and|give|us|a|try!

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|Material</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Network|MUCK|was|made|after|the|Library|MUCK|fell|out|of|favour
by|a|lot|of|its|residents|because|of|its|management.
It|has|a|slightly|Sci-Fi|theme,|though|that|is|only|really|used
to|allow|different|genre|areas|to|be|made|by|any|resident|who|asks
and|is|accepted|to|make|those|new|areas.
Currently,|it|only|has|a|small|playerbase,|but|we|are|looking|for
all|kinds|of|players|(Adult,|of|course)|who|would|be|willing|to
join|and|contribute|to|this|evolving|world.
</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|United|Kingdom<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
||Nightmist|Online|is|a|Partially|Text-based|MuD|(|Multi-User|Dungeon).
That|is|to|say,|there|are|many|players|from|around|the|world|at|the|same
time|interacting|together.|You|begin|by|generating|your|own|character,
with|strengths|and|weaknesses|which|are|individual|to|you.|You|choose|your
class,|and|your|race.|Next|you|are|put|into|a|medieval|world,|where|there
are|monsters,|and|players,|shops,|taverns,|guilds,|and|all|sorts|of|other
things.|What|will|you|do?|Perhaps|you|will|seek|out|the|legendary|Gorgon
Beast,|and|bring|back|some|trophy?|Or|maybe|you|would|prefer|to|become|a
thief,|hiding|and|stealing|gold|off|players|and|monsters.|It|is|your|choice,
so|choose|wisely!

The|best|way|to|experience|this|game|is|for|you|and|some|friends|to
download|it,|and|play|together.|It|can|be|a|little|confusing|at|first,|but
there|is|an|ingame|help|section|(activated|by|typing|'help'|at|any|time).
Remember,|have|fun!

The|Background|of|Nightmist|is|available|from|www.nightmist.co.uk
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Nightmist'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Omphalos|is|a|vaguely|classical-era|mush.
It's|a|reconstruction|of|the|Mediterranean|area|and|beyond.|
It's|currently|in|its|infancy:
but|we're|looking|for|new|builders|and|new|friends.|
You|can|build|or|roleplay|anything|or|anyone
from|10,000|BC|up|to|around|the|end|of|the|Steam|Era.
Omphalos|is|for|those|who|love|text,|
geography|and|the|sense|of|times|past.|
Oh,|and|we|like|a|joke|too.
</pre>
