<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Xaos|is|a|gigantic|framework|that|eagerly|caters|to|both|the|casual
and|hardcore|player.||Some|of|the|highlights:

35+|PC|races|to|choose,|each|with|a|distinct|culture|&|region
A|defined|limit|of|trains|to|pick|from|over|500|skills|&|spells
Two|dozen|Combat|styles|that|each|influence|your|char's|melee
Max|hp/mana|etc|adjust|dynamically|as|stats|do,|no|lvling|gear
Earn|hero|points|from|levels|and|quests,|spend|to|define|your|char
Dynamic|application|of|racial|traits|if|you|have|such|an|ability
40+|crafting|and|enchanting|abilities|to|make|&|improve|things
Possible|to|be|part|of|unlimited|amount|of|clans|at|once,|NPCs|too
A|persistent|world|that|saves|all|objects|on|ground
vMap|-|The|mud's|vast|outdoors|is|mapped|in|intuitive|asci|live
Vast|and|automated|arena|system|with|over|150|NPC|&|PC|competitors
Random|item|generator|extremely|popular|for|randomized|loot
Enormous|world,|over|400|live|areas|(160K|vnums)
Religions|are|deep,|containing|castes|and|unique|traits|etc
Mighty|hero-inclined|areas|designed|for|groups|of|high-end|PCs

Apart|from|all|that|its|got|a|growing|community|of|players|and
staff|from|around|the|world|all|working|towards|making|the|place
interesting|and|fun.||Our|two|coders|(Altair|and|Ragnar)|work|at|a
pretty|constant|rate|to|provide|an|influx|of|code|changes|and|our
builder|staff|led|by|Obscillesk|strives|to|generate|encompassing|
areas|and|expand|the|world's|landscape|with|new|places|to|explore,|
assault|and|conquer.||Also|with|everyone|on|the|account|system|the|
out|of|character|channel|keeps|the|familiarity|of|that|player|
regardless|of|which|character|they|are|using|while|still|allowing|
them|to|mask|the|true|owner|of|one|if|they|wish.||Our|forum|is|also|
linked|directly|to|these|accounts|and|as|such|most|of|our|more|formal|
OOC|communication|occurs|within|it.

We|joke|that|Xaos|will|always|been|in|a|perpetual|Beta|state|but|it|
boils|down|to|the|mud|is|constantly|evolving|on|every|front.||As|it|
is|right|now|Xaos|is|160,000|lines|of|code|and|occupies|170MB|of|ram|
when|running,|comparing|that|to|its|roots|which|were|35K|lines|of|
code|occupying|5MB|of|ram...its|grown|a|lot|and|will|keep|doing|so.
Come|join|us,|there|is|definitely|something|here|for|everyone.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Xaos'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<pre>
XIAIX|is|a|fantasy|based|MUD|with|100%|custom|created|areas|and
creatures.||This|game|was|heavily|influenced|by|the|feel|and|look
of|Warhammer|Fantasy|Role-Play,|and|D&D|2nd|Edition|Dragon|Lance
series.||XIAIX|has|an|extensive|and|detailed|timeline|and|history
for|players|that|desire|to|delve|into|pure|role-play.
We|have|many|game|mechanics|and|enhanced|back|end|features|that|make
XIAIX|truly|stand|out|from|among|most|other|'stock'|games|out|there.
The|staff|within|XIAIX|are|immediately|responsive|to|requests|for
help,|ideas,|bugs,|or|any|questions|that|players|may|need|to|have
answered.||Customer|service|and|player|satisfaction|is|our|main|goal
while|maintaining|a|safe|and|fair|gaming|system|for|everyone|to
enjoy.||To|that|end,|we|offer|open|lines|of|communication|via|email,
website|forums,|instant|messaging,|and|voice|communication|via
Ventrilo|and/or|TeamSpeak.
Log|onto|our|site,|www.xiaix.com,|and|create|your|account|with|us
today|with|the|Player|Signup|link.||We'll|be|thrilled|to|have|you
try|us|out|and|see|a|nice|change|of|pace|from|the|'same-old'|MUD
you're|probably|used|to.
</pre>

<pre>
Zeitgeist

http://zeitgeist.hopto.org/

A|free|browser-based|graphical|D&D/mud-style|MMORPG
based|on|the|Phaos|code.

At|this|point|in|time,|Zeitgeist|is|in|early|stages
of|development|but|is|fully|functional.

Be|one|of|the|first|to|join|this|exciting|new|game!

Features|include:

=|Player-Player|email/messaging|system
=|Graphical|User|Interface
=|Browser|based,|no|mud|client|required!
=|Public|Tables|(Inc.|10|Richest,|Most|Exp|players)
=|Buy|sell|items|to|shops|/|players
=|Tiled|travel|system,|click|to|go!|(soon|to|be|isometric!)
=|Integrated|chat
=|Arena
=|Dungeon|areas
=|Very|friendly
=|Plus|more,|and|more|to|come!

Click|on|the|homepage|link|to|get|started!|Hope|to|see|you|there!
</pre>

<table|border=0|cellspacing=3|cellpadding=3>
<tr><td|colspan=2|align="center">

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|||Aaezure|Odyssey|is|a|great|MUD|for|all|ages.||Formerly
known|as|DeathWish|MUD,|this|is|a|great,|stable|MUD|that|has
been|in|operation|since|1994.||There|are|over|11,000|rooms
with|a|good|balance|of|zones|for|all|levels,|with|more|added
all|the|time.||Playerkilling|is|limited|to|a|Battlefield|only,
and|players|are|allowed|to|play|two|characters|at|a|time|if
they|wish.||This|mud|has|50|mortal|levels,|6|regular|classes
and|4|remort|classes,|and|too|many|great|features|to|list.
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|South|Africa<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
It|is|said|that|a|very|rare,|special|kind|of|butterfly|one|day|
accidentally|crossed|over|from|the|realm|of|Aarils|and|came|to|the|
real|world||this|world.||A|kind|of|chemical|found|in|the|powder|on|
its|wings|caused|it|to|create|a|temporary|gateway|between|its|world|
and|this|-|a|procss|still|today|considered|by|some|as|magical,|and|by|
the|more|synical|-|simply|too|advanced|for|current|science.||It|came|
through|that|portal|and|sat|down|on|a|mans|arm.||The|man|tried|to|
slap|the|butterfly|and|managed|to|crush|the|butterflys|wings|
and|some|of|the|powder|on|its|wings|came|on|the|mans|hand.

That|night|the|man|had|a|dream|about|another|world,|another|realm|of|
reality|too|distant|from|this|and|completely|alien.||Upon|waking|up|
he|wasnt|at|all|sure|whether|he|had|dreamt|it|all,|or|if|it|really|
existed.

By|the|next|day,|the|powder|had|been|completely|absorbed|into|his|
body|and|created|a|gateway|in|his|mind.||And|the|next|night,|he|
dreamt|again.||And|the|next,|and|the|next,|until|he|finally|came|
to|the|realization|that|it|was|more|than|just|a|dream.||He|was
living|-|in|this|reality,|this|alien|realm.||And|he|learned|that|
he|had|the|power|to|control|his|visits|to|this|world.

He|was|the|first|of|the|visitors|who|came|to|Aarils.||Nobody|
knows|how|the|gateway|between|this|world|and|that|of|Aarils|
remained|open||even|after|this|man|had|died.||Some|say|it|was|
not|in|his|mind|at|all,|but|a|physical|gateway||a|portal||
that|opened|between|this|world|and|Aarils,|allowing|anyone|who|
seeks|it|out|to|find|it,|and|enter.

Today,|the|gateway|exists,|and|people|from|this|world|enters|Aarils|
in|search|of|a|new|life,|new|riches|and|new|happiness.||And|some|find|
their|heart's|longing,|while|others|find|only|despair|and|heartache.||
The|portal|is|clear;|the|gateway|open.||The|opportunity|is|yours.||
Will|you|be|a|hero|or|a|foe,|a|wealthy|traveller|or|a|bandit,|a|
farmer|or|a|thief,|a|tailor...|a|shopkeeper...||The|world|is|endless|
and|the|choices|unlimited.||Come|live|the|life|you|always|thought|you|
deserved!
</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Pure|PK<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Supports/uses|MXP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Act|of|War|is|a|fully|functional|PvP|mud.|
It|is|cut|into|three|kingdoms.
Tier|the|defenders|of|the|faith.
Kael|the|embodiment|of|justice|and|war.
UnderMountain|hell|on|urth.

Kingdoms|fight|a|three|sided|battle|to|win|for|their|own|views.|
While|RP|is|not|widely|used,|it|is|accepted|and|tolerated.|
Newbies|may|be|thought|of|as|spies|when|they|first|create.|
Newbies|who|stay|and|level|will|see|things|will|change.
Most|players|are|willing|to|help|out|newbies.|
Some|players|will|be|testing|the|newbies|before|helping.|

AoW|has|a|small|immstaff|who|attempt|to|help|as|much|as|possible.
While|always|working|from|the|shadows.
Imm's|have|very,|VERY,|little|interaction|with|the|PBase.
This|is|done|as|not|to|interfere|with|the|flow|of|the|mud.

This|is|the|"original"|Act|of|War.|There|are|others|that|host.
This|version|was|passed|to|Sagan|by|the|creators.
Imitations|are|out|there.
Please|don't|assume|that|all|are|as|bad|as|those|you|have|played.

The|last|and|most|important|part|of|the|mud|is|PK.
Everyone|should|remember|that|his|is|WAR!
No|one|is|safe,|and|everyone|is|a|target.
The|question|you|must|ask|yourself...|
Are|you|willing|to|fight|and|die|for|your|beliefs?!

Welcome|to|the|War!!!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Act+Of+War+:+Return+To+Urth'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>World|is|mostly|stock<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
This|mud|is|inspired|by|a|live|action|role-playing
game|in|Georgia,|US.||I|hope|this|mud|will|be|a
relaxed|place|where|small|groups|of|friends|can
explore|the|huge|stock|TBA|world.||Please|feel|free
to|come|by|and|help|us|test|it.

We|have|several|race|selections|and|5|basic|classes,
many|new|critical|attack|skills|have|been|added.
This|is|not|a|complex|mud|with|too|many|rules|to
learn,|this|is|a|simple|system|designed|to|mimic
a|live|action|game.|If|you|are|more|interested|in
playing|and|having|fun|more|than|you|are|min/maxing
or|power|leveling,|I|hope|you'll|stop|by.

Thank|you!||

Ossified65



</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Class-less|System<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Educational|MUD<br|/>Research-Oriented|MUD<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|MSP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|and|Adult-Level|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Some|years|ago,|when|I|was|self-publishing|hardcopied|and
electronically-published|roleplaying|games,|I|designed|an|rpg
based|on|a|comic|book|world|of|dinosaur|life|created|by
artist/writer,|Ricardo|Delgado.|Now,|using|the|Unknown|Regions
SWReality|codebase,|I|bring|to|you|the|Age|of|Reptiles|mud.
Unlike|any|other|mud|currently|available,|AoR|takes|place|in
prehistoric|times|in|a|quasi-factual|setting|and|enables|players
to|portray|Deinonychus|characters.|AoR|is|role-playing|enforced
and|fully|player-killing|capable,|in|fact,|the|setting|is
outright|deadly.|Players|may|form|packs|to|better|enable|their
survival|and,|in|time,|might|become|a|pack's|alpha|or|perhaps|an
outcast|from|it.|Characters|can|also|mate|and|sire|fully|playable
hatchlings.|As|a|whole,|the|goal|for|all|players|is|survival|and
character|development|through|pack/mate|interaction.

Recent|changes|include|the|addition|of|three|new|areas|and
improvements|to|the|mating|system!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Age+of+Reptiles'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
||Chronicles|of|Aelia:|Ages|of|Glory|is|a|brand-new|free
browser-based|strategy/roleplaying|game.||Coded|entirely
with|PHP,|Ages|of|Glory|requires|nothing|more|than|a|recent
version|of|IE|or|MoZilla|to|play.||It|has|been|extensively
beta-tested|over|a|period|of|about|a|year|to|ensure|stability
and|balance.

Ages|of|Glory|is|a|strong|step|ahead|of|most|other|free
browser-based|games.||It|features|a|graphical|map|and|icons
rather|than|the|pure|text|found|in|most|free|games.||A|unique
combination|of|strategic|and|roleplaying|elements,|Ages|of|Glory
allows|you|to|control|individual|characters|thrust|into|the
middle|of|a|world|at|war.||Train|your|skills,|gather|equipment
and|ancient|artifacts,|amass|a|treasury,|learn|spells,|and
enhance|your|power.||Build|cities,|recruit|and|train|armies,|and
lay|enemy|settlements|to|waste.

Inspired|by|Civilization,|Master|of|Magic,|Romance|of|the
Three|Kingdoms,|and|popular|browser|games,|Ages|of|Glory|offers
an|experience|unlike|any|other,|and|at|no|cost.||So|what|are
you|waiting|for?
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Ages+of+Glory'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
||Raughir|is|dead,|and|the|Last|Rift|War|is|over.|With|the|death|of|its|Demonic
Emperor,|the|empire|of|Uruadum|has|disintegrated|into|civil|war|and|chaos.|But
from|the|ashes|of|defeat,|the|ancient|city|of|Tenigul|has|arisen|and|asserted
its|independence|and|dominance|over|the|vast|province|of|Akar.

It|has|been|a|difficult|path|to|independence,|however.|Enemies|on|all|sides
have|beset|the|city|and|its|province;|old|alliances|have|been|broken|and|from
them|have|come|new|enmities.|The|collossal|Durnalian|Empire|to|the|Northeast,
across|the|Kunyori|Sea,|has|established|trade|with|Tenigul,|but|there|is|often
a|grave|mistrust|for|the|Durnalians;|they|were|bitter|enemies|in|the|Last|Rift
War.|This|is|a|delicate|time|for|Tenigul,|and|its|people.|Many|and|varying
Factions|within|the|city|and|without|it|are|at|constant|odds|with|each|other,
and|at|any|moment|an|old|rivalry|may|erupt|into|war.|Such|is|the|Kingdom|of
Akar.|These|are|days|when|friendships|are|made|and|broken|overnight;|when
personal|gain|is|the|primary|loyalty|of|most|men.

So|what|will|your|role|be|here,|traveller?|Will|you|profit|greatly|here,|or
will|you|become|the|pawn|of|the|powerful?|Whom|will|you|serve?|Or|will|you
serve|yourself?|The|decision|is|yours,|but|beware|whom|you|befriend.|Not|all
is|as|it|seems|in|the|City|of|Tenigul.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Akarian+Dawn:+Shadows+of+an+Empire'>report|listing|problems</a>

</td></tr>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|Canada<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Anodyne|III|is|the|third|incarnation|of|a|class-less,|level-
less|system|modeled|on|Runequest,|Rolemaster,|Palladium,|and|
other|RPGs.|The|game|is|a|hybrid|between|a|roleplay|intensive|
MUD|and|a|hack-and-slash|game.

Players|learn|skills|and|run|quests|from|mobiles|and|acquire|
random|equipment|as|they|explore|the|world.||Every|skill|and|
ability|is||improved|by|use,|including|mana|and|hit|points!||
If|you|want|to|create||a|certain|type|of|character,|learn|the|
skills|and|put|them|to|use.||There's|very|little|limit|to|
character|advancement.

Randomly|placed|dungeons|in|grid|areas|with|dynamic|
descriptions|insure|that|no|adventure|is|the|same|each|time.

The|game|is|back|up|on|a|new|operating|system,|playerfiles|
have|been|wiped.||Please|note|the|port|change|:)


</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Anodyne+III'>report|listing|problems</a>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Player|Reviews|Refused<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
This|is|a|Rom|based|mud|with|several|features|to|set|it|
above|the|rest,|including|but|not|limited|to:|

-|multi|classing|(true|d&d|style)|
-|ships|(player|owned|and|operated)|
-|a|living|economy|(affected|by|almost|everything)|
-|extended|immortal|functions|(for|running|in|game|quests|
and|such)|
-|weapon|specialization|for|fighters.|
-|elemental|specialization|for|wizards.|
-|mages|learn|spells|from|scrolls,|and|can|scribe|them|to|
teach|other|mages.|
-|traps,|trap|detection,|etc...|
-|and|many|many|other|features|not|unlike|Ad&D|2nd|ed.|
-|many|expansions|for|OLC|to|give|new|areas|more|flavor.|
(oprogs,|new|sectors,|new|flags|(for|objs/rooms).|
-|complete|removal|of|stock|areas.|We're|in|the|process|of|
rebuilding|our|world|from|scratch.|

Features|planned|in|the|future:|

-|caravans|which|take|goods|from|one|city|to|another,|which|
can|at|times|be|ambushed.|
-|new|combat|system,|initiative|based,|involving|weapon|
speeds,|etc...|
-|'instanced'|dragons,|with|smart|AI|who|can|devastate|towns|
and|then|run|to|hide|in|their|lair.|
-|resource|gathering:|foraging,|mining,|etc..|
-|crafting,|such|as|farming,|cooking,|alchemy,|etc...|these|
will|be|another|staple|of|the|mudwide|economy.|
-|and|much|much|more.|
-|skill|trees|based|on|skill|prerequisites|and|stat|
requirements.|

Note:|I've|also|spent|a|ton|of|time|going|through|and|fixing|
most|of|the|prominent|bugs|known|to|rom,|so|right|now|we|
already|have|a|fairly|stable|base,|and|it|will|just|get|
better.

So,|if|you're|interested|in|building/playtesting|here,|
please|let|me|know.|Drop|by|aragond.com:9000|or|just|email|
me|at|drew.haley@gmail.com.|Hope|to|see|you|there!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Aragond:+The+Chronicles'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Welcome|to|Avenshar,|kingdom|to|those|of|adventurous|spirit,|
kingdom|of|noble|lords|and|ladies,|and|kingdom|to|craftsmen|and
merchants.|Avenshar|is|a|kingdom|steeped|in|magic|and|legend,|forged
through|time|by|the|very|blood|and|sweat|of|its|denizens.
Though|Avenshar's|history|is|marked|by|long|periods|of|war|and
conquest,|recent|times|have|not|been|so|bloody,|nor|glorious,|nor
exciting.|As|a|matter|of|fact,|the|last|century|or|so|has|been|a|time
of|peaceful|existence...

Yet,|across|the|Nivaron|Sea,|the|outpost|city|of|Kehl|has|begun|to
take|shape.|The|king|has|put|out|a|call|to|all|stalwart|adventurers:
cross|the|dangerous|waters|of|the|Nivaron|Sea|and|put|your|skills|to
work|assisting|the|growth|of|Kehl|and|ultimately|the|Kingdom.|Be|you|
a|noble,|a|merchant,|or|a|mercenary,|the|rewards|of|fortune|and|glory|
can|be|yours!

Archons|of|Avenshar|is|a|fantasy|themed|game|played|through|a|custom,
|browser|based|Flash|client.||AoA|features|an|all|original|world|and
|storyline.|Roleplaying,|while|not|strictly|enforced,|is|strongly
|encouraged.||Enjoy|countless|hours|interacting|with|other|players,
|advancing|your|character's|goals,|or|simply|partaking|in|casual|
|gaming|in|the|main|city's|tavern.|AoA|features|include,|but|are|
|not|limited|to:
|*|Custom|Client|meant|to|enhance|the|game|world
|*|Equipment|that|saves|on|exit
|*|Limited|racial|selection
|*|Guilds|to|learn|from
|*|Character|customization|through|description|editing
|*|In|game|message|boards,|mail,|help|system|and|more


</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Archons+of+Avenshar'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<pre>
|Arthnor|is|set|in|a|fairly|generic|'Medieval'|world.|
Players|can|fight|with|NPCs|and|other|players,|
and|a|number|of|skills|are|available|(including|
various|forms|of|crafting|e.g.|making|weapons,|
armour,|cooking,|fishing,|mining,|...).

It|is|still|being|created|but|is|quite|playable,|and|
players|are|encouraged|to|contribute|(players|can|
create|their|own|rooms|and|objects).

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Our|mud|is|loosely|Norse|Mythology|based,|with|active|gods,
and|quests.|Role|Play|is|encouraged,|but|not|required.
We|have|a|multi|tier|system|for|classes,|and|race
evolution|system.|We|support|both|PK,|and|Non-PK
characters|and|clans.|Players|are|allowed|to|customize
each|character|to|be|unique|from|any|other|player.
Player|killing|is|optional|with|a|well|balanced
and|sophisticated|PK|system.|Players|may|join|or
create|new|clans,|while|having|the|option|of
purchasing|clan|enhancements|such|as|more|rooms,
guards,|shopkeepers,|and|more.|We|also|have|an
extensive|random/unique|equipment|drop|system.
Immortal|run|quests|and|a|Auto|quests|are
also|available,|along|with|equipment|bought|with
quest|points.|We|have|something|for|everyone.
Anyone|can|easily|learn|to|play|Asgard|whether|
you|are|a|newbie|to|muds|or|a|veteran|of|another|code|base.|
Very|friendly|and|helpful|atmosphere,|and|players.|

</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|and|Adult-Level|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Nestled|in|the|eternal|expanse|of|the|Okeanos|sea,|Atlantis|--the|land
of|legend--|lives|on.|It|serves|as|the|heart|of|a|thriving
civilization|comprised|of|several|island|nations.|While|all|may|
seem|peaceful,|looks|can|be|decieving.|The|sea|is|large|and|largely
uncharted,|new|islands|and|new|enemies|are|revealed|and|discovered|
regularly.|There|are|enemies|within|as|well,|political|struggles|
keeping|the|fragile|heirarchy|of|each|island|teetering|on|the|edge|of
shattering.

Start|your|life|as|a|gladiator|on|the|rise|to|fame|or|an|early|grave,
begin|as|a|simple|seamstress|watching|the|plots|unfold..|or|perhaps|
claw|your|way|to|the|top|to|become|absolute|power|of|one|of|the
many|islands.

AtlantisMUX|was|created|by|staffers|dedicated|to|good|RP|and|rich
plots|full|of|twists|and|turns.|Be|as|involved|as|you|wish|with|the
IC|history|of|the|world|or|merely|take|a|back|seat|and|dabble|in|the
daily|lives|of|the|people.

We|are|currently|in|the|final|stages|of|preparation|but|are|open|to|
guests|who|wish|to|peruse|our|files.|Talk|to|a|staffer,|get|your|
questions|answered,|and|perhaps|get|a|character|created|now|to|be
one|of|the|founding|players|of|a|MU*|that|strives|to|bring|true|RP
back|to|the|internet.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=AtlantisMUX'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<pre>
I|am|happy|to|announce|the|official|launch
of|The|Augmented|Dimension|1.0|(formerly|
known|as|ugradMUD).||We|are|finally|finished
our|three|month|long|(and|very|effective)|beta|
testing|period.||We|are|a|hack|and|slash|
medieval|fantasy|MUD,|with|a|modest|but|
polished|two|thousand|room|world.||We|have|
fourteen|classes,|split|over|two|factions|(light
and|dark)|and|four|races.||We|run|moderated
PK|and|our|code|is|based|on|a|heavily|
modified|CircleMUD|3.1.||We|are|extremely|
stable,|and|haven't|had|an|unresolved|crash|
yet.||We|offer|100|challenging|mortal|levels,|but
the|ladder|is|very|difficult|to|climb|--|so|don't|
expect|to|get|to|get|to|level|100|too|fast!||We|
celebrate|our|launch|with|a|pwipe|to|level|the|
playing|field|for|everyone.||So|this|is|your|
chance|to|show|up|first|and|win|the|race|to|the
top!
</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Resurrected|from|an|ancient|backup,|this|classic|Rom-based
MUD|has|returned.|It|was|named|after|the|capital|city|in
Terry|Goodkind's|Sword|of|Truth|series.|This|MUD|has|a
191-mortal-level|system|with|10|distinct|classes,|where
the|player|can|customize|their|character|by|choosing
skills|and|spell|groups|to|learn|and|practice.|Player
guilds/clans|are|also|offered,|including|the|ability|to|build
custom|guild/clan|halls.|Our|world|has|more|than|6000|rooms
and|2000|mobs|and|is|constantly|growing.|This|mud|is|newbie
friendly,|open|to|the|public,|and|a|grand|text|adventure.

Unique|features|include:
Banking|with|interest
'Forgive'|command|for|accidental|killer|flags
Enchanters|to|upgrade|equipment
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Aydindril+2'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

</div>
</center>

evil|things!

|5.|Choose|from|these|races:|Dwarves|(warriors),|Druids|(clerics),|Elves|(mages),
Illithids|(psionicists),|Avians|(half-human,|half-bird),|Humans|(martial|artists)|and
Kender|(thieves).Cross-training|Availability|-|You|have|the|opportunity|to|practice|some
spells|and|skills|of|other|races.

|4.|A|unique|stat|enhancing|(training)|system|that|allows|you|to|improve|your|stats
without|using|your|practice|sessions|after|the|first|level.

|3.|Hands-on|help|for|new|players.|Barren's|players|will|help|you|out!

|2.|Easily|customizable|ansii|color,|allowing|you|to|personalize|the|color|settings|for
channels,|an|area|for|PK,|and|100+|innovative|areas...ranging|from|original|fantasy|areas
to|puzzle-type|areas|and|more!

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Battletech|3060|is|a|real-time,|text|based|battletech
simulator|where|you|control|a|single|mech|on|the
battlefield|and|fight|alongside|other|players|AGAINST
other|players|as|well|as|AI|on|a|completely|hex|based|
system:|The|world|is|small|entirely|because|the|game|
does|not|conform|to|rooms,|it|really|is|a|giant|map|
just|like|the|board|game!

The|learning|curve|is|steep,|the|game|is|complex.
Do|you|have|what|it|takes|to|compete|with|the|pros?
Get|started|today!

Special|note:|This|game,|while|playable|with|pure
telnet,|is|best|played|with|a|HUD|client|like
xperthud|or|THUD.|These|clients|update|the|map|in
real|time|with|a|graphical|interface|and|make|the
game|far|easier|for|new|players.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Battletech+3060'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|Canada<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Adult-Oriented|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Between|Shadows|and|Light|is|an|unique|combination|of|Rom|2.4|
and|originally|coded|Immortal|Race|skills.||The|concept|is|quite|
easy:|99|mortal|levels|to|familiarize|yourself|with|the|game;|
choosing|an|Immortal|Race|from|Vampire,|Werewolf,|Demon|or|Angel,|
and|forming|clans|for|player|killing.||

We|offer|quite|a|few|features:

*Originally|coded|Immortal|Race|Skills*
*Non-stock|areas|with|unique|quests*
*Player|organized|and|run|Clans*
*Randomized|equipment|drops|for|every|level|of|game|play*
*Full|ANSI|colour*
*MCCP|for|faster|gameplay*
*A|dedicated|server|with|little|to|no|down|time*
*Mature|Administrators|with|years|of|experience|and|no|attitudes*

This|has|been|an|ongoing|labour|of|love|for|the|past|9|years.||
We|are|always|open|to|player|suggested|improvements|and|changes.||
Please|stop|by|and|visit,|we'd|love|to|see|you!||

</pre>

up|the|story|of|the|new|Blademaster,|
Alana|Steeldrake,|right|after|the|
events|of|The|Blademaster|(the|novel|
by|Rick|Bentsen)||New|Blademasters|
are|being|discovered,|and|they|and|
their|protectors|are|being|trained|
in|how|to|deal|with|the|forces|of|Thraal.

Players|can|be|on|the|side|of|Taelin|
or|the|side|of|Thraal...|good|or|evil.

Currently|still|building,|but|we|
are|looking|for|builders|specifically|
to|build|out|the|rich|world|of|Calthea.

</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Ever|wondered|what|would|happen|if|Rukia|and|Ichigo|never|
met|and|what|would|happen|if|the|Bleach|Universe|turned|
out|to|be|much|different|than|it|is|now?

What|would|the|consequences|be|if|the|Bount|and|Quincy|
actually|still|existed|and|attacked|Soul|Society|with|
full|force,|and|while|this|was|happening|the|burning|eyes|
of|two|Vasto|Lords|waited|to|finish|the|job?

The|Soul|Society|is|recovering|from|this|war,|and|the|
surviving|officers|of|the|Gotei|13|being|placed|in|
Zero|Division|opens|up|the|Seireitei|to|new|fresh|faces|
to|take|over|the|responsibilities|of|the|Captains.

The|possibilities|are|endless,|with|the|Human|World|
mostly|still|unsuspecting|of|the|existence|of|monsters|
such|as|Hollows,|the|Bount|and|Quincy|seem|to|inhabit|
it|as|well.

This|is|our|Universe,|your|Universe.

Bleach|MUSH:|The|Beginning|was|created|to|provide|an|RP|
environment|in|this|twist|on|the|exciting|Bleach|setting.|
We|are|intent|on|running|plots|and|guarantee|a|RP|
experience|that|will|not|be|forgotten.|So|come|and|see|
what|we|have|to|offer.
</pre>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Supports/uses|MSP<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|and|Adult-Level|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Blood|Calls|Blood|is|a|heavily|rp|encouraged|mud|based|on|Robert|

Jordan's|Wheel|of|Time|books.|The|original|game|and|codebase,|As|The|

Wheel|Weaves,|has|been|open|since|1998.|The|most|current|incarnation|

of|it||-|The|Shadows|Embrace|-|has|been|recently|(and|most|likely|

temporarily)|shutdown|due|to|hosting|issues.|


The|mud|is|currently|undergoing|a|large|revamp|in|terms|of|both|code|

and|areas,|but|is|fully|functional|and|playable.|We|generally|have|

8-20|people|on|at|a|time,|and|are|looking|for|more|to|come|and|expand|

our|playerbase|enjoy|themselves.

See|you|soon!

The|Aww/Tse/BcB|Staff
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Blood+Calls+Blood'>report|listing|problems</a>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Supports/uses|MCCP<br|/>Supports/uses|MXP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
It|has|been|said,|at|the|dawn|of|time,|that|the|Gods
made|Rourk|and|Loch,|man|and|woman,|the|first|of|the
humans.|As|time|went|by,|the|two|had||differences|
they|could|not|settle,|thus|went|their|separate|ways.
Centuries||later,|the|descendants|of|Rourk|and|Loch|
waged|war|against|one|another,|and||against|the|Elves|
and|Dwarves|that|inhabited|the|realm.|The|Gods,|having|
seen|enough|of|war,|banished|the|humans|to|the|'Dark|
Continent'|at|the|edge|of|the|world|known|as|'Mere.'

Broken|Prophecy|is|centered|around|two|kingdoms,
Rourkland|and|Lochmere.|If|you|are|interested|in|a
highly|political|RP|with|medieval|technology|and
magic|tossed|in,|you'll|enjoy|yourself|here.

We|are|accepting|applications|for|Royalty|and|Nobility.
</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|Burning|Eye|is|back!||Formerly|the|Rebirth|of|Arda,|we|have|
returned.|

||We|have|tried|to|make|our|mud|as|new|and|balanced|as|possible
without|losing|the|best|parts|of|a|Rom|code|base.||The|Burning|Eye|
has|many|improvements|and|additions|to|make|a|good|challenge|for|even|
the|most|experienced|mudder.

While|any|previous|experience|is|an|asset,|newbies|are|welcome.|We
have|tried|to|cover|everything|with|our|comprehensive|help|files|so|
feel|free|to|come|enjoy|an|interpretation|Tolkien's|Middle|Earth.

|||||The|Burning|Eye|features|a|selection|of|intelligent|mobs|who|
will|act|'intelligently'|when|fighting,|casting|or|hunting|and|
avoiding|the|players.||They|will|also|use|equipment|that|is|lying|
around,|even|if|its|your|weapon|and|they|disarmed|you.||
Also|they|all|have|classes|and|are|equal|to|the|players|in|almost|
every|way.||

We|feature|100|mortal|levels,|12|Races,|14|Classes,|6|Clans|and|over|
350|Skills|and|Spells.||No|Level|Restrictions|on|Eq|-|rather|your|
options|are|determined|by|Size,|Race,|Align|&|Class.

|Limited|Pkill|and|Limited|corpse|Looting|is|allowed.||Mounts,|
Gravity,|Languages,|Background|Skills,|Autoquest,|Study,|Traps,|Mob|
and|Object|Programs,|Truly|Unique|items,|Room|Affects|and|much|more.|

We|have|individuals|who|are|actively|working|to|retool|current|areas|
that|are|out|of|theme|and|replace|them|with|more|appropriate|
selections.||Our|immortal|staff|is|active|and|new|features|are|under|
constant|implementation.||The|immortal|staff|is|happy|to|listen|to|
the|ideas|and|opinions|of|the|players|on|a|wide|range|of|matters.|

Come|and|try|The|Burning|Eye,|we|know|you|will|like|it!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Burning+Eye'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<pre>
CamelotAdventures|is|a|brand|new|MUD|on|the|market|in|its|late|developmental
stages.||It|is|being|coded|from|scratch|in|Java,|the|future|of|the|internet.
The|entire|game|will|of|course|be|original,|and|pay-to-play.||The|entire|game
engine|will|be|unlike|anything|you|are|used|to.

We|are|currently|looking|for|Beta|Testers,|Builders,|and|Coders|(Java
Programmers).||Builders|need|not|know|any|programming|to|apply.||All|positions
are|compensated|in|one|shape|or|another.||

Beta|Tester|application|can|be|found|on|out|website,|at
http://www.camelotadventures.com.||Builders|and|Coders|need|to|send|a|Bio|of
themselves|to|CamelotArt@aol.com,|soon|to|be|Camelot@camelotadventures.com.
</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|A|webbased|and|textbased|multi-player|simulation|where|you|can
explore|the|world,|get|into|politics,|get|rich|or|become|a
criminal.|You|can|start|several|characters.|It|is|not|like|most
MUDs,|as|there|are|no|races|or|skills|or|quests,|but|you|simply
play|a|human|character|in|a|world|comparable|to|ours,|in|which
you|can|help|develop|its|society.|It's|all|about|'reinventing'
politics,|economics|and|other|societal|institutions.|Just|have|a
look|at|the|website|for|a|more|detailed|explanation.
</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|50|-|74<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Pay-Per|Play|Mud<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
You|awaken|in|a|small|chamber|deep|beneath|the|Castle|
Marrach.||Who|are|you?||How|did|you|come|to|be|here?||You
explore|the|labrynthine|corridors|of|the|Castle|and|the
questions|seem|to|multiply.||What|are|the|plots|of|the
Castle|elders?|Why|has|the|drawbridge|not|been|let|down|in
living|memory?||Mystery,|intrigue,|and|romance|combine|in
the|story|of|Castle|Marrach.

This|is|a|socialization-|and|consent-based|online
multiplayer|text-based|game|with|Skotos|Tech's|state|of|the
art|parser|technology|behind|it,|based|on|the|DGD
codebase.||Our|custom|client|and|parser|include|features
not|found|in|any|other|online|text-based|game.||We|welcome
you|to|try|it|out!||

Skotos|Tech|published|several|games,|including|Castle
Marrach,|Grendel's|Revenge,|The|Eternal|City,|and|Galactic
Emperor:|Hegemony.|Access|is|free|for|the|first|month|trial
period|and|inexpensive|thereafter|to|access|all|the|games
we|offer!

See|http://www.skotos.net|for|more|details!
</pre>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
CaveMUSH|is|a|mush|in|the|grand|tradition|of|social-building-coding
mushes.|The|main|body|of|the|MUSH|lay|underground,|but|that|need
not|limit|its|content|to|only|subterrainian|venues.||Links|to|the
Modern,|above-ground|world|do|exist.||The|story|below|ground|deals
with|a|race|of|small|peoples|known|as|'Gnomes,'|for|lack|of|a|better
term,|(they|are|different|than|the|small,|docile|creatures|of|which
you|may|have|heard)|and|their|struggle|against|an|oppressive|race|of
snake-men|known|as|Syphians,|who|also|live|underground.||At|this
point|in|Gnomish|history,|contact|with|humanity|is|limited,|with|only
a|few|humans|knowing|of|the|Gnomish|world,|but|with|most|Gnomes
knowing|of|the|human|world,|but|hiding|because|of|their|past
together|(ancient|humans|initially|drove|them|underground).||As|a
human|entering|the|Gnomish|world,|you|will|discover|the|Gnomes|way
of|life,|and|perhaps|help|them|win|an|epic|struggle|against|the
Syphians,|their|greatest|foe.||Player|building|and|coding|is|highly
encouraged|--|in|any|theme|(floating|areas|acceptable).||There|is|no
quota|and|no|building|limits.||Friendly|people.|The|core's|the|limit!
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=CaveMUSH'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|Over|a|thousand|years|since|the|Shattered|Wars,|the|world|has|become|very|much|rebuilt
and|the|dragons,|although|still|around,|seem|to|have|relinquished|control.|Three|lands
have|risen|to|become|civilizations,|the|most|prosperous|still|looked|after|by|dragon|kind
but|each|having|its|own|ruling|government:|The|first|a|realm|where|things|that|humans
would|have|considered|fantasy|have|become|common.|Not|just|dragons|but|also|elfkin|and
others|have|claimed|it|as|a|homeland,|all|ruled|over|by|an|unpredictable|Elven|king.|A
second|land,|under|a|human|Empress,|has|become|a|prosperous|one|that's|strikingly|medieval
in|feel.|Mostly|a|human|population|this|land|also|controls|the|largest|of|ports|and|is
often|a|stop|for|travellers|also|giving|the|most|motley|assortment|of|peoples|to|be|found.
Finally|the|third|land,|one|that|has|tried|to|rebuild|the|advancements|that|humans|once
had,|is|a|slowly|rebuilding|reminder|of|the|post-apocalyptic|future|that|humans|have|had
to|endure.|Controlled|by|the|iron|fist|of|a|General,|this|land|ranges|from|the|broken
runes|of|the|old|world|to|newer|buildings|and|some|suspect|hidden|technologies.
</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
CharmedMUSH|is|an|in-development|Harry|Potter-themed|MUSH.
We|are|based|at|the|start|of|the|1998-1999|school|year.
The|student|population|of|Hogwarts|is|greatly|diminished.
Fear|still|resides|in|many|parent's|despite|Voldermort's|downfall.
Now...|A|new|year|is|starting.|The|focus|is|shifting.

Come|be|a|student,|a|teacher,|or|a|citizen|of|the|Wizarding|World.
</pre>

Ever|wonder|what|it|would|be|like|to|be|in|a|world|where|
Gundam,|Code|Geass,|Final|Fantasy,|and|many|
other|anime|and|video|game|genres|were|
clashed|all|into|one|universe?|Welcome|
to|that|world.|Clash|of|Worlds:|Fate|of|Eternity|
is|a|world|unlike|any|you'll|ever|see|before.|

Currently,|we|are|undergoing|our|development|stage
|and|we|are|in|the|midst|of|hiring|builders.|If|you
|think|you|are|up|for|the|task|of|being|a|builder,
|please|log|on|and|put|in|an|application!|If|no|
IMMs|are|on|at|the|time,|try|sending|an|email|
to|the|head|Admin.

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
A|two|grid|game|that|is|all|about|comic|books|and|comic|characters|
from|the|DC|and|Marvel|universes.|The|DC|game|is|to|provide|new|
twists|to|old|characters|and|give|flexibility|and|chances|to|apply|
adapted|Feature|Characters.|The|Marvel|game|is|to|give|the|chance|to|
play|favorite|Feature|Characters|without|the|weight|of|heavy|and|too|
complicated|histories.|It|is|also|meant|to|make|it|easy|to|write|in|
characters|that|haven't|appeared|yet|in|the|early|timeline.|
Furthermore,|both|games|are|being|built|to|be|OC|friendly.|We|opened|
officially|on|April|16,|2010.

|||||Marvel:|In|The|Beginning...

This|is|a|Marvel|game|that|starts|at|a|sort|of|'year|one'.|The|X-Men|
have|only|be|active|for|about|a|year|or|so,|having|just|a|skeleton|
crew.|Xavier|has|grand|plans|however|as|he|searches|desperately|for|
teachers|and|students|alike|to|make|Xavier's|School|for|Gifted|
Youngsters|a|true|haven.|Iron|Man|is|the|bodyguard|of|the|infamous|
Tony|Stark,|the|playboy|and|trouble|maker.|Still,|Iron|Man|has|
started|to|do|more|than|just|protect|Stark|Industries;|he|is|doing|
truly|heroic|things.|Even|he|feels|the|anger|build|at|the|injustice|
of|it|all,|and|is|thinking|about|doing|something|about|it.|Yet,|what|
can|he|do|alone?

SHIELD|is|an|international|organization|that|is|in|the|beginning|
stages|under|the|U.N.|influence.|Nick|Fury|was|beyond|shocked|at|what|
was|built|before|him,|and|as|he|places|his|hands|on|the|reins|it|is|
only|just|in|time|before|the|world|seems|to|explode.|The|Friends|of|
Humanity|is|becoming|more|terrorists|than|activist|group,|developing|
a|bad|name|even|in|the|public|eye.|Yet|the|fear|is|growing|as|mutants|
and|super-powered|individuals|appear.|Just|wait|till|the|aliens|start|
to|arrive!

|||||DC:|The|Guardians

This|is|an|else-world,|where|many|things|are|different|or|just|a|
little|off.|Selina|Kyle|is|the|owner|of|Kyle|Enterprises|and|secretly|
prowls|at|Catwoman.|Batman|has|been|dead|for|a|few|years,|a|murderer|
and|thief,|as|well|as|the|dead|husband|to|Selina|Kyle.|Superman|has|
left|Earth|for|New|Krypton,|leaving|a|grown|Superboy|to|step|into|his|
shoes|as|Superman.|Green|Arrow|continues|to|make|her|mark,|proving|
that|Robin|Hood|should|have|been|born|female.|After|the|destruction|
of|the|JSA,|the|government|is|finally|overturning|their|
anti-superhero|ruling|thanks|to|the|continued|brave|efforts|of|heroes|
like|Wonder|Woman,|Superman,|Green|Lantern|and|Hawkman.|Stepping|
forward,|Catwoman|is|now|putting|out|a|call|to|found|the|Justice|
League|though|many|of|the|old|heroes|are|finally|turning|in|their|
uniforms|for|retirement.|Who|will|take|up|their|mantels|to|honor|them?

</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Comic+Adventures+Mux'>report|listing|problems</a>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|||The|Cortex|-|An|unending|stream|of|information,|flowing|through|the
'Verse.|Data,|images,|pictures,|money,|lives.||All|affected|by|the|ebb
and|flow|of|the|Waves|floating|across|the|Black.
|||It|has|been|five|years|since|the|events|of|'Serenity'.||Life|goes
on|for|the|citizens|of|the|'Verse,|much|as|before.||Ships|fly,|their
owners|keeping|themselves|free|and|in|the|skies.||Ranchers|Farm,|and
Soldiers|patrol|the|spacelines.||Life|in|the|Core|is|serene|and
peaceful.||Life|on|the|Rim|is|hard,|but|the|rewards|are|still|there.
|||As|for|that|broadcast?||Well,|Alliance|says|it|was|just|a|hoax,|a
bad|piece|of|propaganda|from|some|Browncoat|sympathizers,|holdouts
from|the|War.|Sure,|'twas|an|amusing|piece|of|tall|tale,|but|them
Reavers|ain't|human.||No|way,|no|how.||Certainly,|not|even|the
Alliance|could|be|that|Evil.
---
|||The|Cortex|is|an|open|RPG|server,|where|players|can|roleplay|out
life|in|Joss|Whedon's|Firefly/Serenity|Universe.||Five|years|after
"The|Signal"|was|sent|out,|the|'Verse|still|has|plenty|of|adventure
for|the|people|who|want|to|reach|out|and|grab|it.
|||The|Cortex|uses|a|unique|RP-based|Economy.||The|more|you|RP,|and
the|more|RP|you|generate|for|others,|the|more|Karma|you|generate|for
yourself,|allowing|you|to|control|a|bit|of|the|'Verse.||Karma|can|be
used|to|acquire|equipment,|vehicles,|or|even|your|own|Spaceship,|as
well|as|many|other|activities.
|||A|simple|skill-based|system|allows|for|the|guidance|and|resolution
of|conflicts,|allowing|players|to|not|have|to|worry|about|'stat
buffing'.|The|FreeFORM2|RPG|System|is|designed|for|high|adventure,|as
well|as|small|character-interaction-based|roleplay.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=The+Cortex'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|United|Kingdom<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
TMC|Note:|Mud|now|requires|connection|via|the|mud's|dedicated|client,|
see|mud|website|for|more|info.

Cosrin|is|a|well|established,|roleplaying|and|adventure|MUD|in|a|fantasy
setting.|Friendly|and|easy|enough|to|get|into,|but|challenging,|with|
simply|huge|longevity|for|all|players.|

Now,|for|the|stat-minded,|there|are|some|8000+|locations,|with|more|being
coded|and|tweaked|all|the|time.|Over|400|quests,|ranging|from|the|elementary,|
to|the|truly|mind|bending.|Hundreds|upon|hundreds|of|foes|to|battle|against,|
and|a|similar|number|of|non|combatant|'innocents'|to|add|flavour|around|town.|
Eight|different|races,|and|eight|character|classes|provide|a|wide|range|of|
choices|when|it|comes|to|tailoring|your|persona,|with|four|large|Guilds|to|join,|and|sub-guilds|too|at|later|levels.
The|environment|is|non|PvP,|with|a|strong|emphasis|on|roleplaying,|the|players|ably|assisted|by|the|helpful|staff|
to|create|a|truly|immersive|gameworld.|Help|files|are|extensive,|and|all|Guilds|have|their|own|mentor|programs|
designed|to|ease|newcomers|into|their|new|home.|Cosrin|is|perfect|for|experienced|roleplayers,|who|will|fit|right|
in|and|find|the|wealth|of|material|they|have|to|work|with|is|only|limited|by|their|imagination.|Cosrin|is|also|*the*|
ideal|choice|for|any|true|beginner,|in|both|the|roleplay|and|MUD|sense|-|players|use|it's|own|trademark|'Wizard'|
front|end|to|access|it,|which|is|fully|configurable|to|your|needs,|but|not|so|overwhelming|that|you|are|sent|running|
for|the|hills|by|a|three|inch|thick|manual!|

Aside|from|the|above,|I|can|only|suggest|that|you|drop|in|and|visit,|you'll|find|plenty|of|people|to|help|you|upon|your|
arrival,|and|we're|always|glad|to|see|new|faces|across|the|bar!
See|you|there...first|drink|is|on|us...
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Cosrin'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|No<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Educational|MUD<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
COW|is|a|browser-based|milti-player|virtual|world|which|encourages
creativity|and|fun..|No|plugins|or|clients|required.

All|users|can|create|objects|from|the|start.||
There|is|a|training|shed|with|a|tiny|robot|who|will|guide|new|users
through|the|basics.

Objects|have|'worth'|and|can|be|bought|and|sold.
We|have|a|bank|and|several|shops.|
There|is|also|a|post|office|and|a|postman|who|delivers|when|you|login.

If|you|prove|yourself|worthy|you|can|learn|COWScript|and|code|objects.

All|of|the|commands|are|simply|objects|coded|a|specific|way|so|
making|a|new|command|is|as|simple|as|creating|a|new|object|
and|coding|it.

Building|new|locations|and|creating|new|objects|is|done|like|this:

build|a|rusty|gate|to|an|old|warehouse
go|to|the|gate
create|a|rusty|old|car
paint|it|as|tomato
create|a|dusty|coversheet
paint|it|as|lightgrey
put|it|on|the|car

Naturally|you|can|say,|do,|shout,|think,|sing|and|ponder|to
communicate|with|others|in|the|same|'room'|as|you.

Some|technical|info:
COW|is|running|from|my|own|dedicated|server|so|is|very|fast|
(Its|running|from|a|32Mb|RAM|drive).||
Its|a|single|perl|script|with|a|few|supporting|CSS|and|image|files.
COWScript|is|a|scripting|language|I|have|designed|specifically|for|
coding|objects|in|cow.|
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=COW+Creative+Object+World'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

<pre>
Cowboy|Bebop:|Space|Cowboy|has|been|in|existance|since|May,|2003
and|boasts|one|of|the|most|advanced|and|original|codebases|in
recent|years.||The|mud|is|based|on|the|anime|Cowboy|Bebop,|and
Bebop|ONLY.||No|Dragonball|Z,|pokemon,|etc.||It|is|a|project|of
creating|an|immersive|RP|atmosphere|combined|with|cutting|edge
code|and|player|interaction.

The|mud|is|OPEN|SOURCE|and|gladly|accepts|code|submissions|that
comply|with|the|"todo"|list,|and|boasts|its|own|wiki|at|cb-sc.com
for|development|in|both|code|and|building--not|to|mention|info
regarding|the|game|itself.||The|development|has|been|moving|along
at|a|rapid|rate|due|to|the|active|work|of|several|coders|and|even
more|builders.

The|gameplay|is|getting|more|intense|and|balanced|by|the|day|on
Cowboy|Bebop:|Space|Cowboy,|be|it|in|space|or|on|the|ground.
Players|can|be|a|bounty|hunter,|crime|boss,|police|chief,|or
any|assortment|of|crafters|and|merchants.||With|more|than|50
areas|and|thousands|of|rooms,|any|player|is|sure|to|find
something|they|like!
</pre>

|||X||||||||||||||down|through|the|grand|temple|gate,|descending|

<pre>
|||This|is|my|firt|attempt|at|going|public|with|a|mud,|so|I'm
not|sure|what|to|say.|This|mud|has|been|around|for|about|2
months,|as|of|8/16/99|we|are|open|for|the|public.|Cryptal|
Abyss|is|based|on|SMAUG,|so|it|has|a|few|areas|from|Realms|
of|Dispair,|but|most|of|the|areas|are|custom.|We|will|be|
adding|new|races|and|classes|soon.|Once|you|reach|level|50,
you|may|be|able|to|become|an|immortal.|There|is|layerable
equipment,|which|means|that|you|can|wear|many|pieces|of|eq
at|once,|in|the|same|location.|Before|connecting,|you|will
need|to|go|to|the|webpage|to|get|the|current|IP.|Directions
on|how|to|change|the|IP|is|on|the|webpage.|You|don't|have|to
come|to|this|mud,|but|if|you|want|to,|you're|welcome|to|it!

||||||||||----Danielle,|Founder|of|Cryptal|Abyss

<pre>
|||||The|city|of|Santa|Meringue|is|a|thriving|port|of|call,|a|major|
shipping|hub|into|and|out|of|the|mediterranean|continent|of|Valente.||
1030|years|after|Holy,|the|citizens|of|Santa|Meringue|and|Valente|at|
large|go|about|their|day|to|day|lives,|wether|in|the|fields|
harvesting|argiculture|or|selling|those|goods|in|the|thriving|
bazaar,|the|common|folk|of|the|city|live|and|breathe|and|die|by|a|
series|of|endlessly|repeating|steps.
|
|||But|there|are|those|who|chose|more|then|the|life|of|a|laborer.||
Powerful|mages|study|arcane|energies|in|the|University|Spire.||
Adventurers|of|all|shapes|and|sizes|brave|the|wilds|to|keep|the|land|
safe|from|the|monsters|and|villans|that|inhabit|Gaia.||And|within|
Valente|itself,|the|Noble|Houses|plot|and|scheme|agaisnt|each|other,|
grasping|to|curry|favor|with|the|government.||Your|place|in|the|
city|is|up|to|you,|your|fate|is|in|your|own|hands.||You|find|
yourself|walking|in|the|forest,|and|there|is|a|blur|of|light...
|
|||The|music|plays...
</pre>

|A|very|small|MUSH|at|the|moment,|under|heavy|construction|

more|quickly.|It|is|set|in|southwestern|France,|in|the|
modern|day.|A|cold-war|situation|is|growing|between|the|
sects.

This|is|a|World|of|Darkness|MUSH,|largely|Vampire-oriented|to
begin|with,|though|we|are|working|to|encompass|the|rest|of|the
systems.

We|are|very|newbie-friendly.|Those|who|are|new|to|the|World|of

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|25|-|49<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Player|Reviews|Refused<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|	NOW|HIRING|A|CODER.|LOG|IN|AND|SEE|DISCORDIA.|WILL|EVEN|PAY.

Four|million|and|three|thousand|years|ago,|the|war|on|Cybertron
|continues|to|go|strong,|despite|the|levels|of|available|energon|
sinking|further|and|further|each|cycle.|Much|of|the|planets'|former|
architecture|and|lands|has|been|destroyed,|with|only|a|few|small|
oasis|left|here|and|there,|hidden|away|on|the|surface|or|deeper|
inside|Cybertrons'|inner|layers.

From|the|towering|pinnacle|of|Polyhex,|the|Decepticons|dominate|the|
skies|with|their|air|superiority,|led|by|the|ruthless|Megatron.|
Inside|the|halls|of|their|Flight|Academy,|seekers|emerge|as|trained|
warriors,|ready|to|serve|for|the|glory|of|the|Empire.

Hidden|under|the|dome|of|Iacon,|the|heroic|Autobots|have|been|driven|
practically|underground,|where|their|landbound|forms|gave|them|an|
edge|in|the|constricted|underlayers.|Led|by|the|powerful,|honorable|
Optimus|Prime,|they|accept|all|comers|into|their|own|training|
facility|hidden|inside|Cybertron's|second|layer,|and|struggle|to|keep|
themselves,|and|the|refugees|from|the|war|protected|and|functioning.|
A|daunting|task,|indeed,|and|some|may|say|a|futile|task.

And|finally,|there|is|Crystal|City.|The|last|beacon|of|the|golden|age|
of|Cybertron|on|the|surface,|its'|walls|shimmer|still|with|the|power|
of|Energon,|though|not|as|brightly|as|it|did|back|then|when|all|of|
its'|collectors|were|opened|fully|to|the|sky.|Even|it|felt|the|strain|
of|resources|from|constant|attacks|by|the|Decepticons.|Closing|its'|
gates|to|immigrants,|it|claims|full|neutrality,|remaining|a|trading|
hub|for|citizens|of|any|faction,|and|guarded|by|the|last|of|the|
ancient|Guardians|-|Omega|Supreme,|and|his|brothers|-|and|the|elite|
Crys|Guard,|champion-monks|of|the|Temple|of|Primus.|Led|by|the|
honorable,|if|manipulative|Solarix,|it|intends|to|hold|out|to|the|
bitter|last,|and|even|Megatron|knew|that|razing|the|city|would|
destroy|the|largest|energon|source|left|on|the|planet.

Energy|resources|on|the|planet|change|hands|frequently,|and|each|
faction|has|a|distinct|military|and|citizenry|to|it.|Join|the|
Transformers|as|not|seen|before|in|three|million|and|one|thousand|
years!|Plots|will|range|from|planet-scale,|to|Spotlight|focus,|with|a|
custom|made,|OPTIONAL|combat|and|advancement|system.

Dark|Age|of|Cybertron|is|very|close|to|opening|for|applications,|with|
hopes|of|having|an|official|'opening|tinyplot'|of|epic|scale|in|early|
january|after|the|holidays!

For|now,|we|seek|out|staffers|-|plotstaff|for|long|term,|and|descers|
for|the|grid.|Knowledge|of|Cybertron|and|Transformers|is|essential.

check|out|darkages.isunlimited.net:|7775|and|speak|to|Discordia.|
She's|on|usually|in|the|evenings.
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/><em>Sexually-Oriented|and|Adult-Level|Violence</em><br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Dark|Isles|is|an|intense,|text-based|roleplaying|adventure|for|those
interested|in|developing|an|intricate|character|and|joining|other|
like-minded|people|to|create|a|continually|evolving|story|based|
within|an|originally|themed|world.

Here|you|will|find|no|levels|or|classes,|but|instead|tools|to|help|
tell|the|story,|provide|focus|and|background|for|your|character|and|
the|setting.|Your|character|can|set|up|shop|and|sell|clothes|that|you|
make|with|leather|that|someone|else|has|cured|from|a|hide|that|
another|character|has|hunted.|You|can|build|a|hut,|dig|up|shell-fish|
or|scavenge|the|high-tide|for|useful|items|that|may|have|washed|up|at|
the|beach.|Your|character|can|gather|herbs|and|experiment|with|
alchemy|using|a|mortar|and|pestle.|The|possibilities|are|endless.

ICly|the|game|is|set|on|two|main|islands,|Heas|(the|Human|homeland)|
and|Tarkas|(the|Skrel'eth|homeland).|The|world|is|populated|with|
original|races|that|have|some|basis|on|races|found|in|a|more|
traditional|fantasy|theme|as|well|as|the|option|of|playing|one|of|
four|special|characters:

Wolfkin|-|People|with|the|ability|to|transform|into|wolves.
Dryth|-|People|with|the|ability|to|read|minds.
Vek|-|People|who|follow|the|cursed|one|and|require|the|blood|of|
others|to|survive.
Channeler|-|People|with|the|ability|to|channel|kha|(the|magical|
energy|of|Dark|Isles).

Although|still|in|development|stage,|Dark|Isles|is|now|officially|
open|and|accepting|Beta-testers:|roleplayers|who|want|to|have|an|
influence|on|the|muds|development,|take|on|roles|of|responsibility|
and|rank|within|the|IC|world,|create|history,|become|the|heroes|and|
villains|that|people|will|talk|about|for|years|to|come.|And|if|you|
have|an|idea|on|ways|we|can|improve|the|mud,|we|would|love|to|hear|it|
and|discuss|whether|it|would|be|suitable|to|incorporate|into|our|plan|
for|Dark|Isles.

Note:|Dark|Isles|is|completely|free|to|play.|Roleplay/ICness|is|
strictly|enforced|and|a|way|of|life.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Dark+Isles'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

Dark|Skies|is|based|upon|a|modified|diku/merc|codebase.
WE|ARE|BACK!!!!!!!!
|
We|have|the|following|classes:|
||
|Demon,|Werewolf,|Vampire,|Samurai,|Drow,|Assassin,|Ninja,|Lich,
|Shapeshifter,|Tanarri,|Angel,|Undead|Knight,|Droid,|Avenger,
|Dragon,|Fire|Shinobi,|Earth|Shinobi,|Wind|Shinobi,|Water|Shinobi,
|Shadow|Shinobi,|Holy|Shinobi,|Taijutsu|Shinobi,|Zombie,|Kekkaishi,
|Sorceror,|Phoenix

We|have|getquest,|regular|questing|and|casino.|
We|also|have|IQP|for|special|things.
We|are|open|to|ideas|and|suggestions|if|placed|nicely:)..
We|also|have|momentum|to|earn|special|eq.|
Currently|classes|are|being|re-written|and|balanced|to|try|
and|get|the|classes|better|and|involve|more|skill.
|
Our|immortal|staff|is|friendly|and|helpful.|We|try|to|be|fair,
and|not|play|favorties.|Come|visit|and|view|all|of|our|
additional|features|for|yourself...|
darkskies.ginkosoft.com|port|2000

We|are|a|very|relaxed|MUD|that|is|not|just|your|average|DBS|clone.

ones|which|are|available|for|you|to|explore.||At|Dragonball|Z,|The|
Edge|of|Chaos|(DBZ|EoC),|we|have|a|very|active|RP|player|base|too|
and|welcome|any|others|who|may|want|to|experience|a|more|immersive|
environment|through|the|active|storyline|content.|This|is|the|first|
version|of|the|Edge|code|and|version|2|is|just|around|the|corner.|We|
take|pride|in|maintaining|friendly|players|and|a|Immortal|staff|
which|will|help|guide|you|through|the|many|fun|quests|we|offer.||In|
this|world|the|universes|are|colliding,|leaving|us|on|the|Edge|of|
Chaos.||This|creates|the|ability|for|us|to|allow|many|different|
fantasy|worlds|on|here|as|well.|However,|we|are|still|primarily|
based|on|DBZ,|so|our|themes|will|essentially|revolve|around|those.||
We|want|to|encourage|you|to|feel|free|to|visit|and|check|us|out|for|
our|test|of|this|first|version|of|many|more|to|come.|We|are|
confident|you|will|like|what|you|see.

different|directions.|Whether|it|be|Roleplaying,|Player
Killing,|or|just|playing|the|game.

system,|A|Race|Rank|system,|Automatic|questing,|as
well|as|a|wide|range|of|areas|and|races.|The|mud|is
always|being|worked|on,|by|our|friendly|immortal|staff.|

asked.|Immortals|are|very|hands|on|when|it|comes|
to|the|players,|because|we|believe|that|the|mud
is|yours|just|as|much|as|ours.|

<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>

</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Me|and|Zaphyre|have|been|hard|at|work|making|alot|of|changes|lately
like|critical|damage,customized|pl|ranks,|several|bug|fixes,|etc..|We
are|currently|going|through|balancing|races|and|adding|new|attacks,
etc.|Much|more|to|come|but|we|are|in|dire|need|of|builders|to|help
revamp|the|areas.|We|are|always|accepting|new|ideas|and|we|will|be
putting|much|more|in.|A|few|things|to|come|are|a|gravity|system,|a
better|balanced|combat|system(rather|then|purely|focusing|on|PL|stats
will|have|a|more|signifant|outcome),|Weapon|type/detailed|fighting
stance|specialization,|and|clans!|Stop|on|in|and|be|a|part|of|history
in|the|making!|If|you|any|chance|you|are|looking|to|build|and|i'm|not
on|the|MUD,|you|can|leave|me|a|gnote|or|contact|me|at|email/MSN
messenger|j_miller8809@yahoo.com.

<pre>
Four|hundred|years|after|the|death|of|Goku,|
the|universe|has|seen|a|great|long|time|of|
peace|and|prosperity.||Things,|though,|seem|
to|be|taking|a|turn|toward|fighting,|even|
open|warfare.||The|Intergalactic|Space|Police|
struggle|against|the|invading|forces|of|
Crimson|Imperium,|while|the|Alliance|of|Free|
Trade|(space|pirates)|eat|at|their|very|core,|
taking|what|they|want|and|leaving|nothing|in|
their|wake.||To|make|matters|even|worse,|
Sereitei,|home|of|the|benevelant|Shinigami,
as|well|as|Hueco|Mundo,|home|of|the|wretched|
Hollow,|have|both|been|taken|over,|pushing|
both|into|our|world.||Unique|races|and|
attacks,|options|of|open|PVP|training|areas|
(with|increased|rewards)|and|closed|PVP|
training|areas,|fully|custom|areas,|and|more|
await|you|on|the|adventure|you'll|never|forget!

</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
As|you|may|have|heard,|the|DragonBall|Saga|codebase|
leaked|a|while|back.|We|got|ahold|of|the|code|and|
started|up|our|own|MUD.|Before|you|judge,|please|
note|that|Warren,|the|original|owner|of|the|Saga|
codebase,|has|given|permission|for|us|to|use|the|
code.

DragonBall|and|DragonBall|Z|are|highly|popular|anime|
series',|based|off|the|manga|created|by|Akira|Toriyama.|
DragonBall|GT|was|not|created|by|Toriyama,|but|is|still|
just|as|popular|as|the|original|shows|and|mangas.

DragonBall|Infinity|offers|several|of|the|things|seen|
in|the|popular|series.|Races|such|as|Saiyans,|Nameks,|
Bio-Androids,|Androids,|even|Ghettis;|and|more|races|
are|still|in|the|works.|Skills|and|abilities|such|as|
Super|Saiyan,|the|Kamehameha|wave,|Kaioken|Attack,|and|
much|more|features|bring|the|series|straight|to|your|
computer.

We|feature|an|exclusive|RolePlay|storyline,|derived|
from|the|series|themselves.|RolePlay|is|highly|
encouraged,|with|new|plot|twists|forming|every|day.

Come,|join|us.|We|are|confident|you'll|like|our|MUD.
</pre>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Dragonheart|was|originally|opened|in|1995|by|a|gentleman|named|Daniel
Huber.|He|started|with|a|basic|Heaven|7|system|and|added|all|custom
zones|and|gear.|As|the|years|went|by,|he|continued|to|change|the|world
and|add|new,|exciting|content.

Within|the|past|few|years,|Mr.|Huber|has|followed|his|dreams|and|is
currently|teaching|in|China.|The|most|current|lib|and|driver|were
made|available|to|a|group|of|players|who|took|the|mud|under|control
to|keep|it|going.|Since|Mr.|Huber's|departure,|several|zones,|gear,
and|quests|were|added|to|the|game|to|make|it|even|more|fun.|With
content|continuously|being|added,|Dragonheart|stays|fresh,|while
maintaining|the|classic|original|Heaven|7|feel.

The|current|Dragonheart|is|a|heavily|customized|LP|Mud|with|restricted
pk,|a|100|level|cap,|4|classes,|10|races,|special|abilities|per
class/race,|quests,|etc.||It|is|a|fully|functional|mud|waiting|for
you|to|come|by|and|give|it|a|try.|Several|of|the|players,|including
the|site|operator,|have|been|playing|Dragonheart|or|coding|on
Dragonheart|since|its|inception|over|14|years|ago.

The|mud|is|beautifully|colored,|with|an|extensive|skill,|spell,|and
level-based|advancement|system.||An|active|administration|team|ensures
that|the|players'|needs|are|always|being|taken|care|of.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Dragonheart+-+The+Original'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|Singapore<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Medium|World|(3,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Dragonlance,|forgotten|realms|based|mud|with|unique|classes,|skills,|
leveling,|questing,|heart|thumping|war|and|fusion|systems.|You|don't
choose|a|class,|you|choose|the|skills|according|to|how|much|your|brain
can|hold,|and|the|class|will|be|assigned|to|you.|

This|works|great|for|multi-classing.|The|leveling|system|extends|to
50|and|upon|there,|you|gain|the|ability|to|fuse|with|another|player
and|restart|at|level|5.|This|fusion|mixes|both|genes|and|race|creating
a|more|powerful|next|generation|being|something|that|was|never|been
before.|This|makes|for|endless|replaying|and|customising.|

During|fusion|any|of|the|other|players|limbs|and/or|genes|can|be|
transferred|to|you|and|vice|versa,|but|be|careful,|genes|can|also
be|lost.|Stats|and|attributes|will|also|increase|or|decrease|
accordingly.|No|two|players|will|ever|be|the|same.|With|the|
exception|of|standard|weapon|attacks,|combat|and|spell|casting|time
is|not|randomised,|you|employ|full|control|of|when|you|cast|the|next
spell|or|strike|the|next|hit|through|our|unique|action|point|system.

Try|us|out|to|see|it|in|action.


</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Dragonlance+Legends'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
