<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|100+<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Custom|Server|Type<br|/>Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Pay-Per|Play|Mud<br|/>Skill-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|DragonRealms|is|an|ever-expanding,|massively-multiplayer
text-based|roleplaying|environment|with|an|average|of|over
a|thousand|players|online|during|(USA)|prime|time|hours.
Tens|of|thousands|of|'rooms'|spread|out|within|the|four
known|provinces|and|over|twenty|major|cities.||Players|can
choose|from|eleven|races|which|include|the|fantasy-genre
standards|likes|Elves,|Dwarves,|and|Halflings,|as|well|as
several|unique|choices|which|include|the|feline|Prydaen,
the|reptilian|S'Kra|Mur,|or|the|werewolf-like|Rakash.

There|are|ten|professions|to|choose|from|in|this|totally
skill-based|advancement|system|which|include|Empaths|who
transfer|wounds|from|their|patients'|bodies|to|their|own
and|shun|combat|at|all|costs,|Traders|who|traverse|the
continents|delivering|goods|and|commodities,|Moon|Mages
who|get|their|teleporting|and|conjuring|power|from|the
world's|three|moons,|and|Warrior|Mages|who|wield|a
powerful|combination|of|elemental|magic|and|weapons.

DragonRealms|is|in|a|constant|state|of|growth|and
development|and|is|supported|by|a|devoted|staff|of|over
100|GameMasters|with|years|of|experience.

The|first|30|days|is|free,|so|you've|got|nothing|to|lose.
</pre>

<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Supports/uses|Pueblo<br|/>Supports/uses|MXP<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
DreamScapes|MMOFRPG
|
|A|Massively|MultiPlayer|Online|Fantasy|RolePlaying|Game|that
conjures|up|a|spectacular|gaming|experience|for|all|its
players.|Step|into|a|wonder|filled|world|and|interact|with
people|and|monsters|from|all|over|the|Realm!|Battle|mighty|foes
or|seek|to|influence|the|political|and|religious|balance|...
choose|your|fate.

|DreamScapes|MMOFRPG|is|a|text|based|adventure|game|that|is
free|to|play|and|is|played|by|many|people|all|at|the|same|time.
Within|the|game|you|develop|a|fantasy|character|that|can
interact|with|all|the|other|players|and|many|non-player
characters,|you|can|also|explore|the|huge|world|that|makes|up
DreamScapes.||As|you|explore|you|will|discover|all|sorts|of
cities,|villages,|quests,|guilds,|items,|magic,|and|monsters!
All|these|aspects|of|the|game|are|beautifully|crafted|in
colourful|text|with|storybook|like|descriptions.|The|aim|of|the
game|is|to|increase|in|power|and|prestige|within|the|realm,|as
such|the|ability|to|roleplay|your|chosen|character|is|important
because|with|good|roleplaying|you|will|soon|become|well
renowned|and|respected.|

|When|you|join|the|game|you|will|be|asked|to|create|a
character.||After|that|process|has|been|completed|you|will
enter|the|realm|and|your|character|will|also|be|created|on|the
games|WebSite.||Then|you|can|log|in|to|both|the|game|and|the
site|with|the|same|name|and|password.|Full|access|to|the|site
proves|useful|as|you|can|join|the|community|to|seek|advice,
learn|more|about|the|game,|exchange|ideas|and|participate|in
organised|in-game|events.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=DreamScapes+MMORPG'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>

<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Multi-classing|Allowed<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Enforced<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Cities<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
The|year|is|2246.|A|strife|contrast|to|the|21st|century|
and|the|return|of|magic|in|2012.|The|Earth|has|been|
ravaged|with|war,|pollution|and|new|terminal|retroviruses.
People|look|for|hope|in|the|cosmos,|fleeing|the|world|
of|their|ancestors.|The|newly|terraformed|Mars,
|is|one|of|these|so-called|havens
||but|is|strife|with|Terran|Union|oppression|
||||and|whispers|of|rebellion|are|in|the|air.|
||Information|is|power|now|that|many|
of|the|technologies|and|wisdom|have|been|lost|to|the|
ages|of|violence.|Will|you|be|a|glimmer|of|hope|in|
this|broken|world|or|will|you|take|advantage|and
make|profit|off|its|toxic|state?|
The|choice|is|yours.|
||

|||We|are|a|very|new|MUD,|still|in|alpha|stages.
||||||Player|testing|won't|be|open|till|beta.
|||||||||I'm|very|serious|about|this|MUD|and|hope
||||||||||to|provide|a|fun|and|engaging|environment,
||||||||||||loaded|with|thrilling|RP|story|arcs|and|grueling
|||||||||||||||||||player|versus|player|action,|
|||||||||||||||||||||player|ran|governments,|space|colonies,
|||||||||||||||||||||||armies|and|planetary|city|states.
||||||||||||||||||||||Hiring|all|positions!|
||||||||||||||||||||||I|need|a|devoted|team|that|will|be
||||||||||||||||||||||||||determined|as|I|am|to|make|this|
||||||||||||||||||||||||||||game|happen.|
|||||||||||||||||||||||||Builders|and|Coders|Wanted!
||||||||||||||||Apply|by|email|-|tylerwillcutyou@hotmail.com|
|||||||||||||||||||||or|AIM|-|Hakosho
</pre>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Level-less|System<br|/>Class-less|System<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Small|World|(under|3,000|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
EdenMUSH|is|a|social|roleplaying|mush|set|in|a|cyberpunk|near-future
similar|to|the|world|envisioned|in|William|Gibson's|Sprawl|trilogy.
The|majority|of|EdenMUSH|is|not|centered|around|life|on|Earth|however,
but|instead|on|the|lives|of|those|living|and|vacationing|in|the|space
habitat|known|as|New|Eden.

New|Eden|is|a|Bernal|sphere|type|space|station,|223m|in|radius|with
an|internal|area|of|630,210|square|meters.|The|habitat|supports|as
many|as|9,000|-|10,000|residents|and|generates|near-earth|gravity
along|it's|'equator'|by|rotating|along|its|central|axis|at|2rpm.
Residents|and|visitors|are|afforded|all|the|luxuries|of|earth-bound
life,|with|amenities|mirroring|those|of|any|similarly|sized|resort.||

With|EdenMUSH|it|is|hoped|that|the|players|are|offered|an|interesting
and|exciting|roleplaying|environment,|while|still|leaving|room|for
expansion|and|growth|based|upon|the|ideas|of|the|player's|themselves.

Please|visit|our|mush|wiki|at:
http://edenmush.wiki-site.com/
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=EdenMUSH'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|No<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Encouraged<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Builders<br|/>Currently|Hiring|Coders<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
|Welcome|to|the|mystical|fantasy|world|that|is|The|Edge|of|Darkness.|Within
this|ancient|alternate|reality|lies|a|vast|medieval|realm|know|as|Doraak,
filled|with|adventure,|danger|and|wonders|beyond|imagination.|Almost|every
type|of|terrain|conceivable|can|be|found|within|Doraak's|ever|expanding
boundaries..from|the|icy|arctic|wastelands|to|the|mine-filled|Tahrenian
mountain|ranges|of|the|dwarves.|There|are|the|sprawling|grasslands|of|the
west|and|the|great|barren|deserts|of|the|far|south.|There|are|numerous
islands|in|the|northern|and|southern|oceans|and|there|are|the|measureless
swamps|of|the|east.|There|are|all|these|regions,|plus|hundreds|more|just
waiting|to|be|explored.|And|throughout|all|of|these|lands|lie|countless
ancient|forests,|some|of|which|are|bright|and|pleasant,|yet|others|are|damp,
dark|and|perilous.|In|this|realm,|any|path|can|lead|to|discovery,
adventure...or|death!
|
These|wild,|rugged|lands|are|only|recently|beginning|to|yield|to|the
influences|of|civilized|society,|as|the|many|humanoid|races|of|Doraak
struggle|to|establish|small|pockets|of|civilization|amongst|the|far-reaching
and|untamed|wilderness.|There|are|a|number|of|cities|and|villages|that|can
provide|safe|haven|to|a|weary|adventurer.|However,|even|these|seemingly
peaceful|towns|can|offer|far|more|than|just|a|good|night's|rest,|to|the
inquisitive|or|careless|explorer.
|
In|spite|of|humankind's|best|efforts,|there|are|still|dark|forces|at|work
within|Doraak,|which|seek|to|undermine|all|that|has|been|accomplished.|Both
the|minions|of|evil|and|the|misguided|good|lurk|everywhere|throughout|the
realms,|and|beyond,|building|strength|and|patiently|waiting|for|their|time
to|come|again...
|
So|come|and|test|your|might,|your|skill|and|your|cunning|against|all|that
The|Edge|of|Darkness|has|in|store...for|the|world|of|Doraak|awaits|its|next
savior...or|victim!
</pre>

setting|with|elements|from|star|wars,|star|trek,|stargate,
and|much|much|more.|So|come|on|by,|and|if|you|see|me,
Michael|afk,|please|note|that|if|I|will|probably|be|there
momentarily|so|please|stick|around.

Ok,|its|07/04/09|and|we|are|up|and|running|and|doing|alot
of|work.

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|Under|10<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Limited<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Restricted<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>World|is|mostly|original<br|/>Large|World|(8,000+|rooms)<br|/>Mud|is|fully|operational<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Ensimud|is|a|bilingual|(|french|&|english|)|hack|&|slash|mud.|
Created|in|early|94,|it|has|been|heavily|modified|from|its
original|code|base|(|Circle|2|).|
Major|additions|are|:|AI'ed|monsters,|player|house,|chests|&|clan,|
treasures|table|to|equip|npcs,|encounter|tables|to|populate|areas,|
custom|autoquest|script|language,|random|generated|quest|zones,|
questlike|craft|system,|and|of|course|a|switch|to|french|texts.

The|world|is|fantasy|oriented,|with|circle|2.20|original|areas|and|
lots|of|custom|zones,races,classes,spells...|The|mud|is|currently|
not|very|newbie|friendly,|but|rather|oriented|toward|high|level|
characters|grinding.


A|rewriting|of|the|mud|is|in|process,|orienting|the|game|toward|a|
turn|by|turn|and|tactical|rpg,|using|an|new|and|open|source|codebase.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Ensimud'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

enough|to|see|a|new|day.

still|very|much|under|construction.||

<pre>
EiBE|is|a|WOD-based|game|in|Spanish|set|in|Barcelona|in|2010.|We|
support|Vampire,|Changeling|and|Mortal/+.|Our|aim|is|to|create|a|
small|familiar|place|where|we|can|toy|with|different|ingredients|
of|storytelling|and|concoct|a|few|good|recipes|for|all|to|enjoy.|
We|open|for|RP|in|March|1|2006.|So,|if|you're|looking|for|a|game|
in|Spanish|and|feel|the|hunger,|come|check|us|out.|Extended|info
in|our|website.
</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Et+in+Barcino+Ego...'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>

<pre>
|||The|Eternal|City|takes|a|leap|above|traditional|on-line|role-playing|
fare,|by|offering|a|world|with|fully|developed|political,|economic,|and
military|simulations,|all|from|a|first-person|role-playing|perspective.
Not|only|will|you|be|able|to|lead|the|simple|life|of|a|craftsman,|or|the|
exciting|life|of|a|mercenary|hero,|but|with|nearly|total|control|over
the|environment--you|will|make|and|enforce|your|own|laws,|struggle|with
one|another|for|political|supremacy,|even|lead|armies|into|the|field.
|
If|you|can|imagine|it,|you|can|do|it|in|The|Eternal|City!

<td|valign=top|rowspan="2"|align=left>
<div|style="border:|solid|1px;|padding:|1em;|overflow:|auto;|background:|#300;|font-size:|14px;|font-weight:|normal;|">

<font|face='Times'>Location:</font>|USA<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Primary|Language:</font>|English<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Minimum|Players:</font>|10|-|24<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Multi-Play:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<font|face='Times'>Player-Kill:</font>|Yes<br|/>
<hr|style="padding:|-2px;|margin:|1em;|color:#fff;|border-top:|1px|dotted;|border-bottom:|none;">Extended|Race|Selection<br|/>Extended|Class|Selection<br|/>Equipment|Saved<br|/>Quests|Available<br|/>Character|Approval|Unnecessary<br|/>Ansi|Color<br|/>Roleplaying|Is|Accepted<br|/>Newbie|friendly<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Training|System<br|/>Skill|&|Level-Based|Equipment|System<br|/>Clans|Offered<br|/>Detailed|Character|Creation<br|/>Player|Crafting|System<br|/>World|is|all|original<br|/>Huge|World|(15,000+|rooms)<br|/>Generally|Adult-Oriented<br|/>Mud|is|open|to|players|for|testing<br|/>|<br|/>
</div>

</td></tr>
<tr><td|colspan=2|valign='top'|align=left>

<pre>
Everwar|is|up|and|running|full|tilt!
|
Everwar|is|a|full-featured,|expansive|player-vs-player|MUD.
The|basic|concept|is|a|titanic|struggle|between|good|and|evil|-
player|killing|is|not|only|expected,|but|encouraged!|Evolving|out|of
and|deriving|ideas|from|the|popular|EmlenMUD|Rites|of|Passage,
Everwar|has|been|open|for|close|to|7|years|in|various|states.
It|features|a|total|of|23|races|(11|balanced|per|side,|as|well|as
humans|which|are|playable|on|either|alignment)|and|more|than|200|
skills|and|spells.

Everwar|allows|for|highly|customized|character|design,|using
a|'remort'|based|system.|This|system|will|allow|you|to|restart|your
level|at|1,|but|with|greatly|enhanced|abilities|every|time|you
choose|to|remort.|Upon|remort,|you|can|choose|to|spend|your
accumulated|'remort|points'|in|one|of|more|than|25|different
statistics,|customizing|your|character|to|your|specific|playstyle.
|
There|is|an|extensive|quest|and|crusade|system,|providing|both
exhaustive|solo|and|challenging|group|combat.|The|quest/crusade
system|allows|a|player|to|explore|the|map,|either|individually|or|in
crusade|groups.|Target|mobiles|(creatures,|or|'mobs')|are|located|in
different|far-flung|areas,|which|encourages|discovery|and
adventure.||Through|this|system|the|player|not|only|encounters|the
map|and|other|players,|but|is|also|rewarded|with|quest|points.|These
points|can|be|spent|in|a|variety|of|ways.

Another|major|feature|Everwar|offers|over|other|MUD's|is|an|integrated
overhead|mapping|feature.|With|such|an|enormous|map,|this|is
a|vital|tool|for|players|to|utilize|whether|new|or|experienced.|This
feature|also|allows|new|players|to|quickly|learn|how|to|find|their|way
around|the|world.

The|most|exhilarating|feature|of|Everwar|is|the|player|vs.|player
combat.|Set|in|a|mythic|game|world,|the|armies|of|light|and|the
forces|of|darkness|are|pitted|against|each|other|in|eternal|war.
Good|and|evil|players|cannot|communicate,|which|adds|a|significant
amount|of|challenge|to|the|field|of|battle|a|virtual|'fog|of|war'.
Intelligence|is|gathered|by|scouting|and|reconnoitering|the|enemy,
and|when|your|foes|are|most|vulnerable,|the|battle|is|joined!
Fighting|and|chasing|occurs|over|more|than|23,000|in-game|rooms.

With|your|enemies|vanquished,|the|spoils|of|war|are|yours|in|the
form|of|their|equipment,|as|well|as|'warpoints',|which|serve|to
increase|your|standing|within|your|chosen|profession.|13|professions
are|currently|in-game.|With|choices|ranging|from|the|secretive|
assassin|masters|of|poison|and|deceit,|to|the|classic|warrior,|with|
their|formidable|armor|and|weapons,|you|choose|how|you|want|to|fight!

Visit|our|website|at|http://www.everwar.net|for|more|information.


</pre>

<a|href='/cgi-bin/report.cgi?DIRECT=1&mud=Everwar+MUD'>report|listing|problems</a>
</td></tr>
</table>
</div>
</center>
